text: Thank you Sylvain for your jenerosity and kindness. You made us feel like home, our stay in Madrid was easy and pleasant thanks to you.

Totally recommend this amazing host to everyone! Sylvain is amazing, so open-minded, so smart, so educated, so kind with a sense of humor person! 
We were in Madrid like at home! These are not just words, it‚Äôs really feeling! It‚Äôs incredible when smn is waiting for you and welcoming you at the airport in the city where you‚Äôve never been! 
We had own cute room with a nice view! So comfy! Perfect location! 
Despite of workdays Sylvain tried to spend with us his spare time! What a wonderful time we had together drinking sangria in historical center of Madrid and talking about politics, democracy and Soviet heritage which spread over whole Europe! Wish you the best and waiting for you in Moscow!

Being hosted by Sylvain was an amazing experience for myself and Ana, my friend who was traveling with me.
To start off, he picked us up at the airport and drop us off as well, which there was no need at all, specially because it was very late arriving and very early departing.
Besides that, he arranged a multi-cultural dinner with his flatmates so ended up an amazing moment where we laughed a lot, exchanged a lot of curiosities of each ones' nationality, and got to try different and tasty food! 
He has also another CS guest the same day, and was still managing everything. 
There's no need to detail everything we did within a short period, but the point is that Sylvain is an amazing guy, a super dad and sees people and everything in such a positive way that if everyone had a bit of his positivity, the world would be a better place. 
I do recommend him, I had a blast and I wish his project turns out to be life changing with huge success! 
Thank you, Sylvain, for being such a good host and a good person!
Hope to host you in Brazil and give you back all the good moments you provided us.
Salud :)

Meeting Sylvain is one of those cases when CS introduces you to a real new friend.


As a host he is very gallant, hospitable (and a great chef) , accomidating and flexible. His house is quite nice and spacious and always full f interesting people. He also make sure to change his agenda so he spend sometime with his guests.

To cut a long story short: He loves,and have the know how, of the art of sharing!¬†

I, of course, equally enjoyed our walks and discussions about life, history, art and philosolhy while he was showing me around Madrid " a la movida madrile√±a" style. I equally enjoyed the time we spent together showing  other guests he hosted during my stay Madrid and take them to places they wanted to visit!


My advise to his guests is:¬† Make sure to ask him about the interesting educational and social projects he is engaged in:)


Even he is new to the system, he already became a couch surfer with a big C. Needless to say¬† you are always welcomed to both Canada and Egypt Sylvain!

Sylvain always personally welcome his guest by offering them a ride from airport or train station to his home, and given in depth information how to move around from his home. In the evening, we had some delicious local Spanish food that away from usual touristic place, it gave me the experience of travel more like a local.We do exchange some cultural topics  for each other country and understand each better.I feel impreesed about his social network project, that brought each travellers he met face to face  one step closer to his very specific platform and following  every glory moment that shared on the platform. I wish to stay with Sylvain again on my future visit to Madrid.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

text:
Energetic # superb planner and detailed executioner# dreamer # articulate# inquisitive # patient listener !

text:
Staying with Arnaud is my best Cs experience so far! 
I was going to stay 1 night but ended up 4 nights in the end (even he was busy and had other surfers in the home but he had no problem with this situation).
We spent evenings together having dinner and lovely conversations. Beside saying about his ultra clean and "beautiful" house, he's such a pure soul and a gentleman. Always takes care about you and gives importance to your thoughts. Then for me it's quite normal to feel that I'd known him for a long time.
I will really miss you and all the precious time we had Arnaud. Hope to see you again one day.

He's such a nice guy! I stayed only a few hours with him, because I arrived one day, and I left the next day in the morning, but we could hang out on his flat, we had a nice dinner, and talk about our experiences in life.

Thank you for everything!

text:
Ola, 

My stay with arnaud was excellent. He got back to me superfast even if I sent my demand at the very last minutes. He goes above and beyond just letting you stay at his place. He cooks well, is educated, empathic, funny, reliable, open-minded and probably so much more.

It was my first experience as a couchsurfer and I'm not disappointed, very good experience.

Thanks again arnaud, 

P.S: Don't forget to leave him a note in his guest book ;)

Arnaud took us in last minute, though he just came back from a trip from Costa Rica the day before. We had the honour of being his first couchsurfers after he had been told about it by a friend abroad. At the time he send us a message to invite us to be his first guests,  we were desperately looking for a couch to sleep in Madrid. Communication with him was straightforward. He welcomed us to his home and hosted us for two days. His apartment is nicely decorated and very clean. You'll sleep on a comfortable, spacious pull-out sofa in the living room.  We went out twice to have beer and tapas and meet with friends. He's very interested in traveling and is well-versed in German. He is fun to talk to and hang out with. The only negative thing about our stay was that we couldn't stay longer, as we had booked flights to Bulgaria. We hope to see you again very soon! Thank you :)

Javier was a great host! He welcomed me in the best way possible, with beer and music! We jammed together with a friend of his, went to the city center, where I discovered the bar and the people he loves to hang out with. A true CS experience. Javi!!! He confirmed my very last time request, was OK with me even staying longer than first agreed upon. Although he has an upside-down working schedule, he cares about his guests and shares time, stories and good music with them. He offered to take me from the metro station (I didn't want to bother him up there), hang around the mountains on his day-off (tho I couldn't do it due to different plans), go to a blues bar for live music (really enjoyed it!), offered foods and drinks (even an artisan wine by his friend's dad). In order to sum it up and don't bore all that go through the comments; I enjoyed his hospitality, would love to be his host/guest or meet up with him and would totally recommend all to do so as well. +He has a really adorable dog named as Aisha.

Javier was so kind and welcoming. He is easygoing, flexible and always with a shiny smile. He was working so hard during my visit, so in the beginning, I didn't get to see him but then we got to hang out one time and we had some drinks and food, it was so much fun and we talked about so many things. He has the real traveler's spirit and has plenty of stories to tell you. I even needed to stay 2 more nights and he was ok with it.  I was happy and lucky to know you Javier and I hope to see you again somewhere in this world.

Javier was my first ... My first host on this site of course. I did not meet a more open and kind person, we are very glad that he sheltered us for himself for these few days, told us where to go, what to try in local cafes.

text: Felix's company, even if short, was really nice. In addition to being a polite and friendly host, he got involved in a bit of a freaky evening of music and beer. Have a good trip Felix! Come back and visit us!

Actually it was an honour hosting Felix! He is an amazing guy, young yet mature, very friendly, educated, funny and, above all, he is a super traveller. He is doing an incredible trip around Europe by bike and, despite some difficulties, he has always a great smile in his face. We enjoyed so much having Spanish dinner at our house: Felix prepared for us sangria and tortilla!! Plus we played guitar and sang together at home, he really got an artistic talent also! Felix, I wish you to keep living your life in such amazing way and I hope to meet you again. All the best ‚ù§Ô∏è

text:
I spent 4 days with Jos√© and another surfer at his home. 
He is really relaxed, always in good mood and tries to help you where he can. He even took us to the city and showed us around. But be careful with city trips done Jos√©, because he is a marathon runner. So you can easily end up with walking 20 Kilometers through whole Madrid. But it is definitely worth it.

I stayed 6days with Jose. It was great and Jose was really really kind! I surely want to stay with him again.

Jos√© Luis was a great host! His home is clean and he is very nice. He let me stayed in his own room while he stayed in his couch. He‚Äôs very caring. He‚Äôs ok to hang or not to hang out together. I want to personally thank Jose for opening his home to me and taking me for 5 days. It was very last minute and he took me in, no questions asked. Also he loves Football and sports in general, Real Madrid is really important. Jose loves movies and you can talk hours with him about this topic. Man I loved, the videos and projects you did, really nice and funny. I want to say thank you for the stay. It was great.
My short stay with Jose was great! He‚Äôs very flexible and thoughtful. I met a friend in madrid and he allowed her to stay with me that night at the last minute!!:‚Äô) Thank you Jose!!

Staying his place was totally great!
I strongly recommend him!

text: Jose is an absolutely amazing host! This was my first time using couch surfing and he exceeded all my expectations. He is super friendly and kind, and he makes sure you feel just like you would in your own home. Truly an incredible person :)

text: Jaime and his family were adorable. I had a great stay with them. they are attentive people, open and who know very well welcome. I felt like with people I had known for a long time. I wish experiences like this one to all travelers.

If you want to have an incredible time with an amazing soul I suggest stay with Jamie. His family‚Äôs house was welcoming and beautiful. I enjoyed getting to make a delicious veggie meal together and had a great night out. Even tho I had a short stay it was inspiring and uplifting. I could only imagine a week! See you out there my beautiful spirit friend! :)
Jaime is very cool ! He showed mi some good place and good people. He's very nice !

I had a great time staying  with Federico. He was an amazing host and i felt like home. I enjoyed that we had interesting conversations and didn‚Äôt lose any time on superficial small talk. On the second night we went for an Asturian dinner with his rugby team which was very cool. I enjoyed this the most because it was an experience I couldn‚Äôt have gotten through any other means of accommodation and why I love Couchsurfing. I can only recommend staying with Federico.Thanks for having me!
Very nice experience. Would host again. Recommend! All the best to you Victoria and Letizia ü§ó

Victoria and Leticia were very nice guests although our story began with a small misunderstanding.  Ask them twice to confirm the date of arrival, it is easy to get lost in time a bit while traveling. (: They were very friendly and ready to help from the start. We made lunch and desert together, hopefully I'll see their variation of this cake soon! They got along well with each family member. Cats gave them a hard time jumping on their heads in the night but they managed very well and took over the bed! They are both very interesting persons, flexible with their plans, organized and reliable, I'd recommend them to everybody. 
It was so beautiful to see sisters traveling together and I'm hoping to meet them again, maybe in Spain next time. (:

Victoria and Leticia were very nice, easy going and friendly.  I strongly recommend hosting them. 
Hope you guys have good trip around the world. See you some day.
Best wishes for you!
D.K

After strolling together on the streets of Madrid, it was only natural that I would host Victoria and her friend, Zahra, in Romania. 
I invited them to the countryside to have the full Romanian traditional experience and they were not only eager, but very curious and grateful for everything. 
The warmth and excitement I felt while hosting them is just unimaginable and I really hope you'll host them when on need! 
Sometimes you just host people and sometimes you make friends and future travel companions! Really looking forward to meeting them again! 
You're always welcome here and you should really come again, because that are a lot of landscapes in Romania that you have missed :(

Hosting these 2 girls was one the best experiences as a host. Since the CS request i knew it will be so excited to met them. Friendly ,open, really kind. Its a shame that they already had a brother I want to adopt them as my sisters. Un placer conocerlas!

text: Peter was a guest bearing many gifts. I really enjoyed his stays... we should try to head hunt him to move into our collective suggested Michelle. The carob cake was great.

Peter is eloquent, mild-mannered, intelligent (i'd like to emphasize that) and has admirable amount of integrity. We got along very well from start. 

I will go to Spain many times again in my life, and when in that great country, I'll be sure to pay a visit to Peter. I hope more people on Couchsurfing get to enjoy his company in the future.
Good man!

Peter isn‚Äôt only a great host but also a wonderful person. From shopping at the farmer‚Äôs market, to the¬† walk in Madrid and watching the view to the city from his apartment, every moment was treasure in his company. He¬† is a really smart person with a very subtle way of looking at the world. It‚Äôs really important for him to make you feel at home in his flat and probably that‚Äôs why you immediately fall in love with the charming atmosphere of his little apartment. Some of our most beautiful memories of Madrid are definitely Peter and the long conversations with him. We hope we will cross each other‚Äôs path some time!

It was great to stay with Peter, he‚Äôs a very attentive and friendly host! We had nice and interesting chats over breakfast and lunch and explored the city‚Äôs flea market together. He‚Äôs got a really cute place. I‚Äôd definitely recommend Peter as a super host and I hope will see him again.

Leo was traveling with his friends Estella and Jenny. They are such a nice bunch from Madrid. Lucky to catch a special weekend with the Amsterdam pride happening. Leo, you are a very kind and open person, you surprised me. Hope to see you again!

text:
Leo is a wonderful person and a great host. He is very friendly, very chilled and he's always smiling! He told me to feel like home at his apartment and I honestly did. He lives with two flatmates and with a super friendly dog and a super cute cat who always want to play.
Unfortunately I didn't get to spend much time with Leo because he was busy with work so I definitely must come back to Madrid to get to know him better :)

I had a fantastic stay with Leo and his lovely dog Eddy (plus his really nice flat mates haha).
His apartment is central - just a quick train ride away out of the city centre. 
Leo himself is really lovely - so warm and welcoming and not once did I feel uncomfortable around him.
We also had a little movie night while I was there watching Black Books which was so much fun!
Thanks again Leo for the great stay, hope to see you in NZ soon!!

You can immediately feel Leo is someone with a very big heart and keep his concerned view for the marginalized. 
I unfortunately couldn't host him in Amsterdam when he was visiting a year before but wish I could to get to know this wonderful soul earlier. 
And like others said, Eddie is such a sweetheart who was just calm when my not so dog friendly Yogi doesn't behave. Even more impressed when we biked back together about 9km from the city center and Eddie was keep up the pace all the way while Yogi was comfortably being carried in the backpack. 
Hope to come across soon buddy.

Leo is a very kind and chill person, who has the gift to make you feel comfortable from the first second. Eddy and Nietzsche, his dog and his little cat, had a thrilling energy that I feel like reflects the one of Leo. 
We are very happy, to have stayed at your place Leo. 
Muchas gracias por la comida y todo, hasta luego, te deseo lo mejor!
I had the pleasure to stay at Leos place for the second time. He is a really nice and relaxed guy so that you feel home right away. Muchas Gracias otra vez!!
I had an amazing stay with leo and his lovely cat and dog, he's a lot of fun and knows really good places in madrid. I totally will come back:)

Leo in an amazing and generous person, and I enjoyed so much staying with him and his two roommates for three nights. Their flat has a great and relaxed atmosphere! It's also close to the subway, easy and quick to commute to and from the center of Madrid. 

Truly, the world needs more people like Leo. Keep spreading the positive vibes! :)

Leo was a really cool guy who is easy to talk with and very welcoming. He also has a super cute doggo! He accepted my request very short notice after another host cancelled, and he didn't seem to mind that I stayed at the apartment a full day because some complications arose with my travel plans :) Thanks again Leo, I look forward to seeing you again next time I'm in Madrid!

Leo is very kind and friendly! We really felt welcome! Unfortunately he left after one night and weren‚Äôt sure whether we can stay because the flatmate felt stressed because of us. As he has a dog you shouldn‚Äôt have problems or allergy against dog hair.  Leo thanks a lot for hosting us!
Super friendly, easy going guy. He inspired me for every meaning. He had other CS guest, I got lovin' her. Good ppl makes happy vibes :-) Thanks for everything. You're the best!
Even though we didn't really have the chance to hang out, I can tell that Leo is a really cool, relaxed guy. Staying at his place with his adorable dog Eddy felt almost like home. Thank you!

Leo is a perfect host you could ever wish for! I felt so calm and relaxed staying at his place with wonderful smell of agarbaties, homey atmosphere and with Eddy - he is the cutest dog ever. 

This guy seems to be an amazing person, but unfortunately the karma was so bad for both of us that we couldn‚Äôt go out to get to know each other better :(

Hope to see you once again somewhere and somehow, wish you the very best of luck in applying for a job!

It was really nice staying with Leo because he is a very lovely person and you can feel cozy from the very first time when you see him. In his house you can also feel the warm welcoming by his dog and the positive vibes around.

Thank you Leo and good luck with your exam and life in general!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Blatec, Municipality of Vinica, Macedonia (the former Yugoslav Republic of)

text: Unfortunately, we haven‚Äôt spent long time together, but I can say for sure that Leo is a friendly guy, who knows exactly what hospitality is. Thanks for accepting my last minute request Man ;)

I stayed for three nights by Leo and it was really amazing! He gave me keys from his flat so I could be flexible during my stay in Madrid! Leo helped me with all problems, answered  my questions and gave me some tips about Madrid.  

Thank you so much for making my stay in Madrid so wonderful. I really felt myself like at home. And your dog is just adorable! 

I am always glad to welcome you in Dresden!

Staying with Leo was a great experience. His apartment is very nice and close to the subway. I was given a key so I could come and go as I pleased but Leo was down to hang out too and brought me to a cool bar in Madrid. He also has 2 very friendly, cuddly dogs that I loved.

I stayed in Leos flat for three nights and I felt perfectly home! Leo has this kind of positive energy that you feel comfortable with him and his flat right away. He gave me good recommendations about spanish movies and music and was helpful with anything I needed. I would definatly recommend staying with Leo! Muchas gracias, hope to see you  again, Leo. :)

Thanks a lot!
You were my savior for the first night in Madrid!
Thank you for the time we spend together!
We had a lot of fun and especially interesting conversations!
Besos from "the box" !

It was a realy great experience to stay with Leo.  He gives you the impression that hosting people is the most normal thing to do. Although he was quite busy, he made sure I feel very welcome. He is a very socially concerned person that you can have insightful chats with. Thanks and hope to see you again one day!

Leo warmly welcomed me and had no problems with letting me stay a couple of extra nights :) Leo is a cool and friendly person and even though we didnt got the chance to hang out that much, I would love to next time.  Also his dogs are really nice, and one of them even sneaked up to me during the night and slept by my side,.making sure I was not cold (:  thanks Leo!

Of course I would stay with Leo again! He was actually my savior in a difficult situation. He is very willing to help whenever he can. He is a very intelligent person and it's very interesting to chat with him.  I can tell that he knows a lot about Madrid and about Spain and not only that, he also has a very strong perspective about the social (political and cultural) movement in the country that is very interesting to try to understand when you are a foreigner. His flat mates  and his dogs and his cat are also adorable!!! See you soon, my friend.
I was sorry that the timing of my trip meant that I couldn't spend more time with Leo but he, his flatmates and dogs made me very welcome and were a friendly and interesting bunch. Thank you all.

Leo its a really cool guy !!! He waa really eager to share his knowledge about the city and even he didnt have enough time to go out with me and my friend he was always trying to help us to do a cool city tour and know the city from a diferent perspective. He also its really friendly and easygoing that makes you feel so comfortable and you can share with him really interesting conversation about everything. And also but not last... there are 3 amazing and loving dogs in his house that just make your stay so happy and funny !!! Thanks for everything Leo and please send kisses to Eddy, Lennin and Tara :) Nos vemos por Lima !

Leo is a person with very good vibes, I  felt really welcomed and accepted by his friends and dogs straightaway. He was caring, sharing, inspiring and very empathetic.  Thank you for all your extra help and see you in Christiania Leo! :-) :-)
fromPublicAddressDescription: Plymouth, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text:
Leo is a fantastic person who is passionate about many things. Great to chat to and hang around with.
Gracias Leo!

I've stayed at Leo's house for 4 nights and although, unfortunately, we didn't have much time to hang out due to the music festival he attended, he met me at the railway station, give personal recommendations about his fav city spots, which made my first impression of Madrid picture-perfect and let me stay at his room for the whole 4 nights despite his absence. Especially I'd like to mention that he and his roommate Jordan (and even their next-door neighbors)  helped me out of some unexpected troubles and even understood my poor Spanish :D AAAND pets are extremely adorable :)

I appreciate the hospitality, trust and some respect of privacy I've experienced living at Leo's, so I do recommend him as a host.

Leo was really nice to us, as he let me and my girlfriend use his bed and as he walked with us in many areas of the city, explaining many things and concepts about it along the way. We had a great time with him and his dogs, which are extremely nice. His apartment, where he lives with two roommates, is also not far from the city center. I hope I will see you again in Montreal or elsewhere!

fromPublicAddressDescription: Mar del Plata, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

text: I had a really good time at Leos place meeting his amazing roommates and lovely pets ‚ù§Ô∏è everything is easy to reach from there and he helped me to explore the best places in Madrid. Leo, thank you so much for these three nights I could stay at your home, and thank you for letting me sleep in your bed :) Siempre eran bienvenida en mi casa en Berlin, tambien con todos los perros jaja. Espero que nos vemos muy pronto!!! xxx Pia

Leo and his friends were so down-to-earth, friendly, warm, and welcoming. We really enjoyed talking to/hanging out with Leo and his friends each night after exploring the city! His dogs are the best; they are so sweet and loving.

Leo was a very nice host to me!
He haven't much time together, but he is definitely very friendly! I enjoyed his vibe and also his dogs and house. Not in the center, but well located. 
I wished we could talked more as he seems to have a good mood and thoughs, but my Spanish wasn't so good as well, lol.
Thank you very much Leo, wish you all good!!

Leo and Laura went above and beyond to be generous, kind and friendly hosts to me! They invited me to a friend's barbecue and although I don't speak Spanish, I felt very welcome and had a lovely time. I was only suppose to stay two nights, but Leo graciously offered me his room while he and Laura were out of town, so I crashed a bit longer. It was such a pleasant and generous surprise, I can't express my gratitude enough! His roommates are also super friendly and I had my own key to come in and out. Would recommend Leo to anyone who wants to meet a friendly face and stay in a safe, comfortable home while in Madrid (: Leo, Laura and his roommates are always welcome in my home!

I and my friend, Tsutomu, stayed Leo's house three nights. Leo and his girlfriend, Laura, are really kind and flexible couple. They always made us feel home. Also, they gave us tips about the sightseeing in Madrid. 
We visited the Toledo together by Leo's car. It's nice for saving money and they are good guide. 
I definitely recommend Leo!!!

Leo, You and Laura won my heart <3 It's so nice to know, that there in Madrid are some really amazing people, who you always love hanging out with. From the first moment Leo was a friend and gave me a home in Madrid. And if this wasn't enough, he took me to his work and I (I can't still believe it) danced flamenco in a social center for older people and then we went to a exhibition about the refugees crisis and cried together. Then we drank together. You are a really special guy leo and I hope we see us again, and I'm so looking forward to your stay in berlin ;)

Only stayed with Leo for a day and a half but it was great! Unfortunately, he was sick with the flu so we didn't get to spend much time together but he picked us up at the train station and was very kind throughout our stay :) We loved meeting his girlfriend as well, she is super nice and down to earth :) Thanks for everything, we really appreciated it! You both have a place to stay in the US :)

We really enjoyed staying with Leo! He was super helpful by writing down in detail what we should see in Madrid, what to eat, and how to best use public transportation. He is also very knowledgeable about social justice issues concerning Spain, and we had very interesting conversations together. We would have loved to spend even more time with him, his house mates, and his girlfriend, they were all very nice. Thanks so much for everything Leo!! Muchas gracias!!

Leo is a really nice and flexible guy.
We met pretty spontaneously, after my circumstances made communication a bit difficult . He was still very relaxed and helped me out.
I felt as if we were friends right away.
He cooked for me and his friend without question and they took me out for the night.
I had really good time there!
Thank you Leo! :)
Sweet man. You‚Äôd enjoy his company.
Great travel stories and fun to talk with!
Ahhhh Lorien was lots of fun! He was down to do almost anything! He was very curious to learn about the city. He was very neat with his belongings. Looking forward to see you again Lorien!
I stayed with Jordi for a few days! A true wine lover and fun guy. We had deep talks and also went out! Very clean house. He is also a great cook and a better local guide!

Jordi was very open to whatever I wanted to do in Madrid he just jumped in üòÅ we had nice dinner, fun at karaoke and dancing 90s hits. Overall very nice experience and new friend in Madrid. Next time I will learn more Spanish football songs üòÅ Thanks Jordi and hope you don't loose your wallet üòâ

Jordi let me stay at his place while I was struggling with the housing search in Madrid. He was a great host who was super helpful and even looked at apartments with me! He also showed me some great places to eat and introduced me to his friends. It was great meeting Jordi and I would definitely recommend him as a host.
Clean Man

An amazing guy with a big heart and it is always fun to be around him :) I missed the chance to meet Pablo in October when I was in Madrid, but luckily it just took him half an year to come to Budapest, so we could finally meet up. He and his friend Julia were staying at my place for a night, but what a great time we have spent together! It was really cool to have some nice talks with them in some pubs or even at breakfast time.  I hope that you had a great trip afterwards and that we will have the chance to meet again sooner or later ;)

I had a reaaally great time hosting Pablo! :D It was short but sweet. Pablo is very kind and thoughtful, and has some mean drawing skills. He drew me Batman and I absolutely loved his rendition. He also brought me some really tasty homemade cheese from Spain, which I served on a family lunch and my parents and I were thrilled with it. Pablo is a very smart guy, fun, loves to hang out and chat, has a lot to say and has a good sense of humor. And he's a very kind soul :) Overall we clicked nicely, I wish we had more time together and I look forward to see him again. :*

I got along so well with Pablo. We seem to be quite similar in many ways, in our approach to life, food and drink and that means I had a great time hanging out with him and just chatting about life and the world. Took him to my favorite beer place and I could see he appreciated it :D Though his visit was short I feel that I made a good friend during that time and I'm sure we'll see each other some day soon. Until then - na zdravie!

Well, I would say that everybody that I have met in my life has had an impact on me, but Pablo and Estefania are those special ones, amazing people that made me think positive and  they are showing you that there is always the bright side of the life. 
Both very curious of other people, cultures, history. I saw them enjoying every minute, every sip of a beer they tried, every meal they tasted. And they made me enjoyed every minute with them! We¬¥ve been talking, joking, laughing, doing everything and nothing! Second day I had that impression that I know them since ever! 
Such a great, lively people! See you soon.. somewhere! And never forget that you both have a place to stay here!
Pablo, youuuuu beer sommelier, come back and let¬¥s have some Miloslaw o Ciechanow together again :D

text: When it comes to Couchsurfing, Pablo and I are two peas in a pod. Proof of that were our endless conversations about travelling, languages, design, vegetarianism and so on. Pablo and Estefan√≠a are driven, knowledgeable and dedicated hosts and I can only recommend discovering the culinary wonders of Torrej√≥n de Ardoz, fooling around with Charlie or spending time with them in any of their multiple adventures abroad. ¬°Hasta la pr√≥xima, compa√±ero!

text:
It turns out to be so hard to write this reference.
Since we'd been texting over the Internet for more than a year when I realised I was going to Madrid there was no doubt who I'd message about an available couch. And I've never regretted it. Pablo hosted me and a friend of mine for about 5 nights in February with a short break in between when we went to Germany. He was also too kind to pick us up from the airport and then take us back there in the middle of a Saturday night!
Pablo is an amazing host who lives in an amazing place with an amazing dog. Everything that CS asks for when you provide a reference is there: he is an incredibly friendly, thoughtful and knowledgeable person. I would never have learned the fantastic things I've learned about Spain if I hadn't stayed with Pablo. I enjoyed every moment of my stay with him. He is so easy and interesting to talk to that I literally couldn't see how the sands of time were running out.
He's also extremely funny, so, get the chance and, please, ask him to tell you what "Tres metros sobre el cielo" is about! Or just ask to parody some accents!
Don't miss out the opportunity of meeting such a cool person and send him a request immediately or accept his if he's asking for a couch!

Thanks so much for everything and I'm glad we're friends!

P.S. Now I think that Torrejon de Ardoz is even more appealing than Madrid :)

Well.... what can I say about Pablo?! He is an incredible person! As my first host abroad he, Estefan√≠a and Charlie made me feel at home. Pablo is extremely friendly, fun and helpful; he made me laugh a lot, try new foods (vegetarian), took me to all turistic points of Madrid and also introduced some of his friends, I really enjoyed meeting them and, of course, expending some time changing the spanish way of life in night clubs hahaha I enjoyed every single moment and this amazing experience will follow me for the rest of my life! Thank you so much for opening your house and your arms to me! I wait for you in Brazil. Don't ever think about loosing the chance to meet this guy, pay him a beer hahaha =)
Hasta luego y muchas gracias amigo!
Ps: I'll miss saying 'Vamos a la calle!!'

text:
Staying with Pablo was great! He provided plenty of information to make sure I arrived at his home safely. When I arrived, I was so exhausted that I slept my whole first day away, but Pablo was understanding and made sure I was comfortable. On the second day, he made sure I got to the station for the city-center train and knew which stops to take. That night he invited me to a housewarming party for one of his friends. It was great meeting and talking to everyone even though I know zero Spanish so they made sure to teach me some interesting phrases. 

Thank you, Pablo and Estefan√≠a for letting me into your home.

You have absolutely nothing to apologize for, I am writing even later, I am really sorry about that.

Pablo is a very funny and open minded guy who travels a lot. We had a good laugh and he showed me artefatcts he had brought from his travels among which was one of my childhood books :-) He is an absolutely perfect host, picked me up from the station, cooked and dropped me at the airport, thank you so much and please do accept my apology for the lateness.

Nuno is an amazing guy and the best host one can ever have in Madrid! He came and picked me up at the airport. text: Nuno is nice, helpful, friendly person. I stayed at his house during 5 days. We went out to dinner and fun together! . I spent really good time with him. Thanks for everything. I hope we will see each other again :)

Whatever I'm going to write won't do justice to the true and veritable good nature of this guy. Nuno did not just host me; he wholeheartedly assisted me in a series of unfortunate events that befell me during my visit to Madrid. Besides being always willing to help, he tried to cheer me up and took me out for a coffee then a nice lunch party with his equally nice and good-hearted friends. He permitted me access to all utilties of his comfortable and clean flat and trusted me with its keys, and that made it much easier for me to take care of my recurring troubles. Not to forget to mention that I overstayed the agreed period in his flat without him being bothered at all. I cannot possibly count the many genuine human qualities I saw in Nuno, I can only be thankful for my misfortunes which led me to meet this wonderful persona. 

Nuno, I'm forever grateful for all that you've done for me. I look forward to meeting you again.

All the best.
-Walid.

With Nuno me and my friend did a great couchsurfing-experience! We arrived in Madrid in the evening and Nuno picked us up from the airport. His home is clean, tidy and central located. Nuno is very trustworthy, he also gave us a own key so we were independet and flexible. The couch is big enough for two persones and highly comfortable. 
We cooked for him in the evening and he stand us a good wine. I can really recommend him... :)

What an amazing couchsuring experience!
Nuno has a great positive energy soul to be around.  I stayed at Nuno's place with my friend. He did not cancel our staying despite he had to leave Madrid for a family issue.

He gave us lots of information about Madrid and 'must see' places. His house is very central and easy to access. 

He even cooked for us and we had a nice conversation about life in Madrid.

Thank you Nuno for being yourself and sharing your space with us :) 

Cheers!

Nuno is a man with a great heart and strong personality, he is a great conversation-partner and has lots of travel experiences. text:

She graciously let me stay in her apartment, and we would talk over breakfast, have tea‚Äîshe helped me plan out my days and what to do/see, and we spent time together, but never felt pressured. I am so grateful to have met her, and to have learned so much. 

To future Couchsurfers‚Äîit is such a privilege to know Amalie; don't take it for granted! Only things I'd mention are to keep cultural differences in mind, be respectful of space/rules/using items, and perhaps bundle up because the apartment may be a bit chilly :)

Merci beaucoup, Amalie ‚ù§Ô∏è I am so blessed to have met you.

text:

She introduced me to her co-workers and  took me to local spanish place to have dinner, I loved all of her friends!

text:
I stayed one night in Amalea and Jose's place at Madrid. Although it was a national holiday and they were coming from a trip, they were still full of energy and life when I met them for the first time.
Their apartment was extremely clean, the bed (I was sleeping in sofa bed) was very comfortable and they had lots of plants which sleeping by them made the experience even more fascinating.
However, I will remember their character more than their apartment. Her kindness in showing me around the town, helping me buy souvenirs and doing all while she had to go to work is unforgettable. I told her, and I am repeating it here as well, she reminded me of my older sister :)
I wish the greatest future for this young lovely couple, and I can‚Äôt wait to see them next time they pass by Canada.

I've been friends with Amalea since our Uni time in Montreal. 
Crazy girl but adorable ;)

Jos√© was great to chat with and I enjoyed having him stay for the night.

Jos√© is a very friendly guy who made me feel welcome from the beginning, he told me lots of interesting stories about his life and helped me  to find good places to go in madrid and we also went for a walk throuhg the city, where he showed me around the center and explained everything, that was really cool, his flat is well located, im happy that i could stay with him for 2 nights, he is very willing to help, what i really appreciate, like when my kreditkard didnt came out of the atm in the middle of the night üòÅ defenetly recommend to stay with him, thanks a lot jos√©!!:)

Jos√© is the host that every surfer would like to have! Calm, intelligent, funny... I only have to thank him many times for receiving me at his place, even in very busy days at work for him! Thank u, Jos√©! Waiting for u in Salvador!

text:
I'm very glad that I met Alexandros! I stayed with him only for a one night nut it was very interesting and inspiring :) 
He does a great thing, volunteering as an English teacher in Colombia, I enjoyed talking to him about it and a lot of other topics. It's great to meet such people like him because it makes you remember that the world is a wonderful place :) 
Alexandros, I'd be happy to meet you anywhere in the world again!

Alex is a very nice guy! We stayed only one night at his place but we had enought time to share a dinner with him and his friends. 
We talked a lot about Greece and the political situation and also about Alex's work, so we were very happy for meeting new greek people. 
Thank you for helping us and for spending some of your free time with us :)

I stayed with Alexandros for one night. We went for coffee and beer and we did some walking around the town. He is very talkative and friendly, he will always find something to talk about! He has a lot of funny stories to tell, too. Thank you! :))

Alex is a very very nice guy. Even is we had not many time to spend together we felt like being good friends already
He is open minded and cultivated and his cat is crazy  :-)

Alex is a really nice person and host and we both fell in love with his little cat :) We had good discussions and he joined us the next morning for a part of our bicycle trip. 
Thank you for hosting us!

It is not easy to find hosts like Alexandros these days on Couchsurfing. From the moment you meet him, you can feel his positive energy which is an embodiment of the true Couchsurfing spirit. Just from speaking with him, one can easily see his curiosity for people and his inquisitive mind which makes me love Couchsurfing in the first place. I wish you all the best to your South American dreams!

Alexandros accepted my last minute request even though he already had one other guest coming!! I'm very grateful to him :) We didn't spend so much time together because I arrived in the evening and was leaving early in the morning. Anyway, he is very kind, talkative and easygoing. I definitely recommend him! \^-^/
A great guy living in a great city! Thanks a ton for the night and for chasing me on the road to bring me back my glasses, that was a lovely gesture! See you 'malaka' :p

Alexandros was a great host! He made me so confortable at hƒ±s place and ƒ±t was really ƒ±nterestƒ±ng to talk wƒ±th hƒ±m about Greece and our travel experƒ±ences! Thanks a lot and I hope you'll be able to do an Erasmus!

text: Alexis is such a cool person! He hosted me in Zakynthos in my first experience as CSurfer, I didn¬¥t know what expect, but it was completely awesome. text: How can I write something that can do our time justice.!? This was my first CS experience.. I feel SOO lucky that it was with Alexi. We had a small connection -a little town in Northern Greece, where he is from &also my dad's family- so it was off to a nice start. Alex is such a beautiful person. He is always open & clear communicating with you. We spent every day together exploring all of Zakynthos.. I met & hung out with many of his awesome friends too when he was at work. I didn't end up going to Lefkas or Corfu because we were having so much fun! He is a very kind, gentle hearted, calm, fun, interesting & just the most lovely person who is everything that CS should be. I have so many wonderful memories with Alexi - & my new friends.. u will have the BEST company with him if u meet him! I MISS YOU & can't wait to see you in person again in Florina, Melbourne, &everywhere in Greece so we can be sirius & fall over, & spill &drop things together haha. BIG HUGS.. your little stravaDi:)

text:
Alex was a fabulous host, meeting us at the ferry and taking us back to his great apartment with magnificent views of the port. We went to the beach and enjoyed a couple of beers and he even took me around to all of the people he knew to help me find employment. I am happy to say I found a job as did my daughter and now with Alex's help again we have our own apartment.
It is a great little island with very welcoming people, although don't come if you don't want to party. I am so glad that I met Alex, he is a kind and easy going person to be around. I wish him all the luck in the future with his journeys and his 'teaching' career. I love that I know at least 2 people in Ios, one being the policeman. Thanks Alex, see you for a 'fishbowl' xx

text: Staying at Enrique‚Äôs house was incredible, even before arriving. He was very kind and attentive. He gave me advices from the beginning like which metro ticket is the most convenient. His house is very clean and with great illumination and very good energy. He travel a lot, and he knows a lot about his city;  he prepared a summary with the best touristic things in Madrid and he also showed me the unknown Madrid. We spent time together and with some friends of him and of mine. He also tried some vegan food, so we could had lunch together a couple of times. He said that is good to try new things, and even better if it‚Äôs for sharing moments with new friends. He was very happy because he now can give some advices to vegan visitors. Is a very open minded person with a great heart, and he knows very well the concept of couchsurfing. Always trying to made me feel comfy and at home. Looking forward to hang out with him again somewhere in this world. Gracias Quique!

Enrique hosted me and my girlfriend for 2 nights. He was very welcoming, although he was probably busy on a weekday. Thank you for taking us to the parade and  for the dinner before our flight to Barcelona. You‚Äôre the one who‚Äôs interesting to listen to, this is what we usually expect from our staying with CS hosts. Again we are lucky for encountering a decent and intelligent person with who you‚Äôre ready to share everything you have. Enrique was very responsive to everything we were asking him about, starting with a towel and finishing with an explanation how to use Uber. I was so hesitant to wake you up at 5 a.m., thank you for doing that without my help :)
Wait for the photos we took recently , there are a couple where you‚Äôre smiling by the way.
Definitely recommend Enrique and his apartment for the people who are looking for a thoughtful host and are willing to share their time with this amazing person who is not waiting for something back but deserves it.
11/10 for Enrique from us.

Enrique was a really nice host. He was pleasant and attentive. We could not spent a lot of time together but we enjoyed the time we had.
He recomended to us a lot of interesting places to visit. Also, goods restaurants to eat cheap.

Enrique is an excellent host! Very hospitable, communicative, interesting, with a good sense of humor. He guided me across the city and advised a good flamenco show. Also helped me a lot with my troubles in Spanish. Thank you for tappas and wine! See you in Saint Petersburg!

text: Enrique is a great host! He made me feel like I was in my own home. He knows everywhere to go out, especially for ca√±as and tapas and special things that are happening in the city an any given moment. I recommend to anyone traveling to Madrid to stay with him.

Enrique made my first Couchsurfing experience memorable and exceptional!
He was very thoughtful and made us feel straight at home. 
My flight was delayed and he was understanding  towards us arriving late. 
On our first day  he set us on  a track after looking into what our interest were . I don‚Äôt think we would of covered as much with out his support.

Enrique is great! He welcomed us in his nice apartment in Madrid being as helpful as a person can be. Advice, tips, typical Spanish hidden gems, he knows where to send you. If you don't know just ask him and he will get you started. 
Enrique has visited most places on this beautiful planet so with him, it's great conversations ahead. We share many common interests and it's always a delight to meet and talk to someone that you can share your passions with. He helped us out a lot in our transition phase where we continue to travel by tandem. He will probably always remember us by "the tandem couple", he should!
Hope to see you again one day!

This was my second time staying with Enrique. When I needed to stay overnight in Madrid I immediately asked him because my friend and I had a lot of fun with him the last time. I did again this time around!
I also got to see his new flat, and got to be the first one using the guest bedroom. How cool am I? üòé Joke aside, it has a very comfy bed and a really nice view of Madrid! 
See you again soon, my friend!

Had such a nice stay with Enrique. He made us feel welcomed and we really felt at home when we were at his flat. He was also kind enough to show us around Madrid and take us to some really nice places. He was great company and a really lovely guy. Thank you so much for everything!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Norwich, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text:
Enrique is an extremely kind and nice person. He welcomed my friend and I into his home for two nights this week-end, sharing with us his food (even though he was on a strict diet due to an upcoming medical procedure), his advice on things to do in Madrid while he was having lunch with his family on Saturday, and his time by taking us out for drinks and tapas on Saturday night and spending the Sunday with us at the flea market in La Latina and the Retiro park. He has traveled a lot and lived abroad even longer, and is very knowledgeable on many topics. He was also kind enough to not judge us too harshly when my friend and I got drunk on the wine and tapas tour, and made sure we did not do anything stupid like chasing after balloons or cross the road when cars were coming! Sorry again for that, Enrique...
As for his flat, it is very nicely located, not so close to the tourist attractions that you get disturbed by the noise, but it is also only a 15 minute metro ride away from the center of Madrid. There is also a direct bus from his place to the center which takes a little longer but is a nice way to see some landmark buildings from the comfort of a warm seat, which is what we did on Enrique's advice! And if you are into football he lives super close to the Real Madrid stadium. The sleeping arrangement is great also, Enrique has a sofa-cama that can easily fit two people (I have quite a bit of fat and could still fit with my friend). His living space is very uncluttered, which is awesome in a city like Madrid where things go 200 km/hour, and he has the coolest book shelves on earth!
Thank you for a great week-end, Enrique. We hope to see you again soon, in Madrid or in Palencia, if you wanna see all three of our touristy places!

Enrique is a fantastic man! He picked us up from the airport when we got back to Europe, made sure we feel comfortable every minute of our stay, has been very thoughtful and hugged goodbye as an old friend before we left:))  I don't really know of what more to add in here. 
Will keep in touch and hopefully - see each other again someplace sometime!! Come down to the rednecks land!! :D :)

It was nice to spend time with Enrique. He is cool, open-minded person, friendly and talkative. He travels a lot, there is a lot of things to discuss with him. He gave us some ideas what to see in Madrid (the city of course has a lot to offer) and showed us great places to have ca√±as y tapas. He was very thoughtful and wanted to help us as much as it was possible. It was really nice almost two days we could share. Definitely I would recommend him to all people who look for nice companion.
See you again and take care. All best for you!

Enrique was one of the best hosts I‚Äôve ever had. Hands down. Incredibly thoughtful, kind, encouraging, and willing to help my fianc√© and I last minute. We enjoyed conversation, a night of tapas and drinks, and enjoyed the tour guidelines he provided. I would highly recommend staying with or hosting Enrique if you get the chance. We look forward to seeing you soon, friend!

We found Enrique on a hang out app and he accepted our last minute couch request immediately! He has been very helpful and thoughtful, offering his beautiful home, time, sharing stories and knowledge of Madrid and else.
We couldn‚Äôt really ask for more. It has been a blessing to cross paths with this wonderful man, who just got back from a trip himself. 
Trustworthy, funny, wise and a value time guaranteed :)

Will see you soon , dear, we appreciate your effort and just always remember, that you have a home with us in Alabama (or wherever else we would be in the future) :)

If you will ever have a chance to host or stay with Enrique - do yourself a favor!

All the best,

Ramune, Robert & the baby boy to be

I have met Jorge and his friends as I was away when they needed a couch, so I left them a key and felt I could definitely trust them. They totally "followed" the few rules I have, and left the house perfectly clean and tidy and tasty :) 
Thank you very much and I hope we'll meet one day!

It was my first couchsurfing experience and I am sure I couldn‚Äôt get any better. Jorge and his flatmate  are great hosts. They‚Äôre intelligent, knowledgeable and funny. Jorge took me and my friends for a wine,  talking with him was a pleasure because he has a lot interesting stories and also is open to hear yours. His apartment is beautiful, very stylish and in the heart of city center! I can believe how lucky I was to be accepted by Jorge. I am so grateful, thank you!‚ù§Ô∏è

Jorge is a really great person.. We felt as if we were at our own home and we are glad to meet him & spending our last moment in Madrid with him..
Hope to spending more time together in the next time ^^

Unfortunately I didn‚Äôt have much time in Madrid and spent only 1 night at Jorge‚Äôs place and it was so lovely! Even though we didn‚Äôt talk much, Jorge helped me with info I needed before my arrival, was very friendly and flexible about my stay and always kept in touch in WhatsApp. I wish I could spend more time at his place.

Highest recommendations if you have a chance to meet/host Jorge- he‚Äôs such a jovial company!

And of course you‚Äôre always welcome to Ukraine anytime! :)

Just some minutes before we enter the aircraft, while we were ready to lose the flight and not having yet booked a place to stay my phone rings! Message from Jorge that we can stay at his place! :)) His place is very cosy with a really nice decoration, very very close to the city center, in a walking distance.  We felt like home! What can we say about you Jorge! Jorge is a lovely, friendly, openmind guy! I wish we had more time with you! Maybe in Greece! You are very welcome wherever you choose Rhodes or Athens! Hope to see you! Definately next time you will have a cheesecake! Until then we hope you liked the "melekouni". Hugs from me and the villager!

‚ÄúMi casa es su casa‚Äù, that‚Äôs what he said and that‚Äôs exactly how he made me feel. 
Jorge is an amazing guy. He is open minded, curious, easy going, confident, intelligent and interesting. We had great conversations and he gave me some great advices on what to see/where to go in Madrid related to art and food, my two passions. 
His apartment is beautiful, original, spacious and decorated with taste. 
I had a great time, thanks Jorge.

Jorge was the helper in my hour of need !
Due to the lack of time, my friend and I didn't even sleep at his place. But we could refresh ourselves in the middle of the night and relax just before going back to the airport.
Jorge has a beautiful and clean flat and he is very easy going!
Our whole stay was just a good relaxation. 
Thank you Jorge :)

Jorge and his roommate hosted me and my friend 2 nights in Madrid. The boys are really friendly, easy-going and relaxed. We spent great time listening to good music, having couple of drinks, enjoying good conversation and lot of laugh. we even had GOT- night ;) 
So,I would strongly recommend both of them- let them host you or host them. They have a lot of interesting stories to tell and also a great and clean apartment. 
I really hope to see them soon in Belgrade!

Jorge is a really helpful guy. He hosted me and my friend for 5 nights, and he gave us good tips where to go and what to eat, nice chats and great music. Thanks!:) PS Maybe we could meet again at The Kooks concert:D

Was super cool to stay with Jorge back in mid August. Kacy and I had a great time and it was also really thoughtful of you to take us to the lakes. Top bloke! If you ever need a place to crash in NZ or Aus, give me a bell :-)

On sunday we had the oportunity to wonder around Madrid with him and he tooked us to some special spots we will always remember. Thank you for everything and hope to see you soon, wherever that may be! Lola y Valeria

text: Alicia is a very positive girl. She came to Rotterdam only for one day and I tried to give her a special tour to Rotterdam. Not the touristic one! We went to a nice lunch bar, a museum, watched a movie, cooked together and went out to a very experimental music and video evening at the International Film Festival. I think it was not something she  would have visited when she didn't met me, but she made a lovely evening of it! She is very open to experience new things and that's realy cool! She is also very easy going. She told me afterwards that it would have been nice to see more architecture, but because of the cold, she was totally fine with the program. If she will come back in summer and I am back from Melbourne I will show her the architecture of Rotterdam! I promise! :)

text: David is a very helpful guy who suggested me lots of places to visit in Madrid. He enjoys life and the small pleasures it offers. By chance, when I arrived at his place, there was an event in his neighbourhood : Tapapi√®s, which means cheap tapas in Lavapi√®s. Thus we logically tested a lot of tapas together and went to see a jazz concert in a bar, it was a very nice night. The next day, we tried a nice rooftop, good food and a flamenco workout. ¬°Thank you so much for making my stay so great and I hope to see you soon!

David host me and my friends. We were surprised he was a neat guy, and very easygoing. David has the life experience in different countries, so we exchanged a lot of different views. We had the great cultural exchange with food, had very nice dinner together. He gave us useful tourist information, and very easy to visit all the attractions from his home. We had the awesome time in Madrid, I hope we have the opportunity meet in Taiwan. David Thank you a lot!
David is a friendly and easy to talk to guy. Thanks for showing me some great areas to go out in Madrid. I thoroughly enjoyed the music, food and wine!
Marina was a wonderfull person with very good character and we had a great time. she is smart very kind and with good personality, i will host Marina again for sure.... im happy that i meet her.

An aerospace engineer turned business consultant involved in high-impact social entrepreneurship projects? This is Marina, my high-flying & high-profile superguest from whom I will learn a lot. How can I praise enough her and be grateful enough to the life for giving me the opportunity to became her friend? Marina is a jewel of the young generation and, like a masterpiece of today's world, is on her path toward   a sure great success. I love her remarkable ambition and her amazing intelligence, which blended with her humble approach makes an outstanding and engaging person. And I really loved to host her, regretting only the fact that she stayed with me too few days :)

It was great to have a CSer who could talk to me about my two passions, music and entrepreneurship. She's very polite and a perfect guest, very easy going and she has this really friendly vibe which she projects.   She respected everything about me and my lifestyle and I was really pleased to have her around for a nice evening.

Marina and her argentinian friend (sorry I forgot his name :S) stayed at my place for 1 night  on their way to the south. We didn't spend too much time together but we had some interesting conversations and felt comfortable with them. All the best!

Marina is so darn cute and sweet, literally like 10x what her picture shows, really, you gotta host her to find out.  And she comes along with this fine young gentleman.  Super fun to talk to, I'm happy to have hosted them even for the one short night. :)

What can I say about Ricardo?  A simple, easy-going and cheerful  Spanish guy doing Erasmus in Istanbul, Ricardo has been very supportive and kind to us, and his house was full of fun. He and his friend Enrique helped us a lot to get orientated in the city, by giving us useful tips and sharing their experiences, as well as chatting till late at night around a bottle of wine.
Besides, his house is in a very cozy and typical quarter of Istanbul not very far from the center.
I wish him to host and be hosted by amazing persons like him.

Ricardo is the man! I arrived in quite a bad state after the airline had lost my backpack with all of my clothes and important documents, but I basically forgot about this over my time in Istanbul. He was so helpful with retrieving the bag making sure I had everything I needed to get by and enjoy the city. A really funny and friendly guy, I don't know what more I can say. Thanks for everything t√≠o!

Ricardo has been an amazing host. He's kind, light hearted, generous and positive. He and his housemates accepted me in their house without hesitation, allowing me to arrange my last days in Istanbul with the freedom that I needed. We did a lot of things together and we remained independent when needed. Not to mention that I met plenty of amazing people thanks to him. 10 outta 10, overall charming. Keep it up man!

I was travelling in Spain with my friend, and staying at Hector's place was our first experience with CouchSurfing...and it was fabulous! We feel really lucky to meet Hector, because he was behaving like an old friend of us, however we were complete strangers. He has a nice apartment, and he shared everything he had (food, metro ticket, experiences, stories, etc.) with us, so we really felt like being at home. It was really awesome how fast we became buddies, and walk around in Madrid together during the 2 days we spent there. He was partying like a real disco expert: when we were already dead, he was still dancing...this guy is unbelievable! 
I think I can say that we have found a new friend, who really is a lovely and caring person! We are really grateful that he had us at his home and make our trip unforgettable, thanks again!!

flora and niki from Hungary

text: Samuel and Alexia were a second part of our ,,lost family" and our kitchen occupiers for more than a month and I can say that they are very pleasant people. And Samuel, you made a mistake, the true length of marathon was 90.267 meters, I need to tell you that story again someday.  But anyway, this couple is pleasant for staying, they are not so loud and we had a nice time with them introducing meals from our countries and watching Yugoslavian movies. text:
Eduard was truly the perfect host. He personally could not host me in his house but arranged everything so that I could stay with his friend Lenin and was always around. He's an amazing person I felt comfortable with instantly. We had a great time listening to me speaking ni√±a-spanishüòÇ I really appreciate it that he was so patient and kind to listening to me babbling espa√±ol. 
He's also a great batchata, salsa and reaggaeton dancer (and teacher) as well and taught me so much in the days I stayed there. We went out to dance and he showed me the city as well. He's a really thoughtful, kind, calm and just genuinely nice person. You will not be bored with his company!
I would totally recommend staying with him if you want to have the best time in Madrid! 
Muchas gracias para todo, especialement para bailar! Eres un chico muy guay seguro que nos vemos otra vez!

We had a great time with Eduard. He helped us a lot during our trip with my friends. We had a lot of fun. We have discovered different nice places in Madrid for having party thanks to him and his friend Lenine. We have spend a lot of good time together. Thank you for your kindness. You're welcome in France guys. Gracias chicos, hasta pronto !

Eduard is great company and very fun to go out dancing with! He is a fabulous salsa & bachata dancer and knows all the best places to hang out! Thanks again Eduard, I hope you‚Äôll let me show you the dancing in Sydney one day!! :)

Eduard is a really nice and helpfull guy. He was waiting for me and my friend and it wasn't a problem for him. He taught me to dance salsa. He was very hospitable. I felt like I know him for long time. His friends are nice and funny too. I hope we can have opportunity to meet again :):):)

Roberto was nice and gentil. clean and polite. what else can i say about it- Roberto has been a perfect couchsurfer and a lovely friend. He talked with me about the countries he visited, and about some sports that we both like. I enjoyed our conversation so much. 
If you have a chance to host him or to be hosted by him, you will have a great time üòÅ.
Roberto is really nice and kind and a very funny person. He is a talkative and easygoing person as well. I definitely recommend him!

text: I surfed his couch for only one night but what a night !!! Alvaro and his flatmates had a party at home where I ate homemade tortillas and listened to them singing popular Spanish songs and playing guitar, ukulele, percussions and even trumpet ! It was great, very entertaining even after a long day without sleeping (from 5am till 4am the next day O_O). That's a good traveling experience.

First time Jos√© visited me, while I was guest already 2x at his house. He is a kind and trustful men, he is smart, thaughtful and sociable. I can recommend everyone to host this charming guy and don't miss the chance to become friends as we did.

Jos√©, hope to see you soon again - you know, you are always welcome!

text:
It was definitely one of the best experiences in Spain.. I would say he wasn't just a humble and welcoming host but a good friend too. 

We walked around almost the whole of Madrid and he showed me some interesting places, we also tried some delicious food and would definitely not forget the first Spanish movie that I watched with him at his place. And yeah, the flea market was also fun. I wouldn't have been able to explore Madrid the way I did if it was not him. 
He was very helpful with everything and made me feel at home while in Madrid. It was overwhelming as he also came all the way till the bus station to guide me with my bus. 

I would definitely like to go again in future and yes Jose, hope you have great fun during your India trip, never hesitate to ask for any help you need. You have a friend and a home in India üòä

I had such a special time in Madrid thanks to Jose. He is kind, funny, cultured and so open minded ! I immediatly felt confortable with him. We went out with some of his friends a I enjoyed a lot my stay in his company. I surely made a friend by meeting him. Hope to see you again Jose !

I just stayed one night in Madrid with Jose and all I can say is that he has been one of my favorites hosts ever. Jose embodies the perfect host's personality: welcoming, flexible, talkative, kind heart. Even though I arrived late in night -and left early in the morning-, we could talk a lot. He made dinner for me and we could also share breakfast together. We walked around Madrid at midnight which was amazing due to I just had a few hours to enjoy the city. Jos√©, you have now a house in Mexico and I hope you can visit it soon, gracias!

My friend and I were so sorry when we had to leave Jose! We spent 2 nights at his flat and spent nearly every minute of the weekend together. Jose made us felt like home, he is very kind and cared a lot about our wellbeing. He showed us the city and we even met his friends, went out to drink and eat together. Jose showed us Spanish music and we had deep talks as well. It's a pity that we don't live close to each other as we had the feeling to be friends already! 
Don't miss the chance to meet him, he is friendly, open minded and I can't imagine any better host. 
Jose, we have to say thank you for all your kindness that made our stay so amazing!

Elvio was really nice! He hosted me in his cozy apartment which is located in the central of Madrid, showed me some really good spots in the city and gave me a lot of recommendations for my continuous trip in the south.

text:
Rosanna what an amazing soul, very friendly, bubbly, open minded person, very flexible and always willing to help out and full of information. 

We stayed with Rosana for 3 nights me and my friend Sophia........and we where really impressed at how clean and organised her flat was. We also loved her little dog (I think her name is Grace), she is so sweet, unusually she is quiet, does not bark or make noise like you would expect from a small dog. They are usually very loud and noise, but she was really sweet/cool and just wanted to cuddle with me on the sofa.

Rosana picked me up from the station with her lovely pink car, which i thought was very sweet and kind of her to do. We got on well straight from the beginning even though she struggled to speak in English but mostly because she wasn't confident but she is really good in English.

So Im definitely recommending staying with Rosana or just meeting up with her for a coffee/drink, you will definitely i have a great time with her.

Rosana thank you for an amazing time in Parla, i really enjoyed staying with you I'm only sorry that the time was short but we definitely gonna keep in touch. So remember my dear friend, anytime you come to England my door will always be open to you...................mi casa es tu casa ok. Greetings to you lovely daughter! God Bless you!!!

text: David is a perfect person to stay with in Madrid. Being hospitable, friendly, fun and super smart he made our stay as comfortable as possible. He even cooked traditional Spanish tortilla for us and we had a great evening out after. I'm so happy I got to know you, David. Thanks for hosting!

David was my first CS host in Madrid for my first 2 nights and my stay with him was an amazing experience :) He was super helpful with sightseeing tips and recommendations, he made me a typical Spanish food.  On the second evening, we went out to meet several of his friends who were really cool (Erasmus people like me!) and went all together to Teatro Kapital (a place you really need to go when you are in Madrid). I'm very grateful we met! Feel always welcome to visit me wherever I will stay! Thank you! :)

David was my first Couchsurfing host and my stay with him was an absolutely amazing experience! He went out of his way to make me feel welcome and was SUPER helpful with sightseeing tips and recommendations. On the weekend and on evenings after he got off work, he showed me around the city and took me to a couple of great restaurants/bars. I also met several of his friends who were really cool as well! Plus his flat is in an amazing location in Madrid-- you can walk to almost any of the major attractions. We had so much fun over the couple of days I was there and I'm SO grateful we met! xoxo can't wait to see him in NYC!

David is super intelligent, friendly and a true gentleman with an outstanding sense of humor. I really enjoyed our talks (his English is perfect by the way), dinners and salsa party where he had kindly invited me. David, you are always most welcome in Moscow!
I couldn't have asked for a better host! David is great üòÅüëåüîù

Was magnificent to meet David. Going around Madrid was easy and  interesting on his company and guiding. Charismatic and ingenious positive mind! We enjoyed talking about our cultures and Polish culture which we share in common :)) Is awesome how people become world citizens traveling ‚òÜ. His place is lovely and very cozy! I had the pleasure to taste his food and Bimber :)
Thanks for all David and we are waiting for you in Krakow to continue our journey to Lviv ‚ô°‚ô°

David is a really interesting and smart person! It was a very friendly atmosphere in his home. He played guitar for us and we spoke a lot about traveling. I'm grateful for everything and truly recommend David as a host. Thank you, see you somewhere around the world;)

Me and my friend stayed two days with David and we had a great time together. 

He was very helpful when we arrived and we went out for tortillas and beer - he has a lot of experience with couchsurfing and many funny stories to tell. We also went to a party with free drinks which was awesome. On the last day I lost my passport and even from work, he was trying to help me.

His house is very well located at the center and a charm - we even had a big bed for us in a separate room. We also had easy access to metro and some main touristic areas. 

We would definitely stay with David again and hopefully he will stay with us when he goes to Brazil.

text:
david is really cool host. very uncomplicated, fun, talkative. he met us, gave us keys, showed around. we wished to spend more time with him, but also our evenings out was cool. he's a charismatic guy with good vibrations and right approach to life. so we felt us very relaxed around him and were happy to be hosted by him.

furthermore his apartment located perfectly in the center with a lot of cool bars and cafes just around the corner. 

thank you again david! i suppose we'll see us again somewhere ! you're welcome in hamburg or in ukraine !

David hosted me and my boyfriend for 2 nights in Madrid. He offered us a place at last minute when our other host had to cancel our stay due to work so we are really grateful for that. He's a considerate, open-minded, kind, and incredibly hospitable person. His place was located in the city centre with a beautiful corridor. It was really cozy, clean and comfortable. He showed us the city on several days during the day and night. We spend some time with his friends and ate delicious tapas. He also showed us the nightlife of Madrid which was amazing. David gave us great tips and information about the city. I would recommend him to anyone on CS if you want to meet a great person with always a smile on his face. Thanks again for everything you did for us! Our home is also your home! Big hugs <3

David is a really nice guy) me and my friend had a nice evening with him and his girlfriend, watching football) for some reason we couldn't stay longer with him) but his apartment is just perfect located (bars, shops, cafes, squares) thank you very much, David) hope to see you again!

text: David hosted my friend and I during our trip through Europe. David is a very nice host. He's friendly and easy to talk to. The other people living in the house are also very nice. They made us feel very welcome. Thanks for hosting us! I hope we meet again.

David hosted us in Porto. His apartment is super cool and filled with friendly people, and even other couchsurfers! We only stayed for one day but they were very nice and are welcome in the states anytime :)

David hosted me few days in Porto. He is a good couchsurfer. He took care of me, told what to do and introduced to his friends. He is open-minded, helpful. His flatmates are cool as well. You will never regret your stay at their house and in their compaign! Thanks David ;)

I had a great time with Marco who took the time to invite me and to spend the evening chatting even if he had a work to do. Thanks to him, I really discovered the main issues of Central Americas.

He knows the city and the cheapest places. He speaks both spanish and english.

Thanks a lot Marco ! I hope you'll meet him during your stay in Madrid

He has a place to stay in Kansas City, and hopefully we can meet again in his country of Guatemala. Of course I recommend him. You‚Äôll feel lucky to meet such a nice guy as Marco.
