text:
The more I dance and know new people the more I understand that salsa will never welcome to her world a single bad person.
We were united with Ismael with the same addition to carribian music, and by some fantastic chance he turned to be my wonderful host in Madrid!
I highly appreciate every chance to meet indeed a good person while travel to new places, because together with wonderful atmosphere of a country or city, human attitude to each other when you are far from home makes you feel very special.   
I was lucky to be a guest in his beautiful house just for 2 nights, but I was so beautifully treated, that with pleasure would stay there for more if I could:)
Ismael is very attentive, intelligent,   gentle and respectful young man.  Dancing, talking, eating and walking with him were equaly enjoying! He has interesting experience from traveling  to asian countries and his stories of that were really interesting!)
Thank you for everything!!!
I wish you every your traveling turns to be unforgettable and only good people as guests in your home.
My biggest Spanish pleasure in this year was meeting you, Ismael.

Ismael is a really kind man. He felt me like I am at home. His flat is comfortable and nice. We had a tour together of some places in the center It was great. I loved Madrid I can't skip that part he is a good dancer :) we danced a lot. I can totally reference him to other surfers .
Ismael was really nice host, super hospitable. He was good city guide and bachata teacher! Really central home location - easy to access all parts of the city. Recommend this host :)

Me and my friend were guests of Ismael for 2 nights and it was great üôÉ He is such a nice intelligent person) We had so much fun talking both evenings till late üôÉ He gave us recommendations about places to see, routes to go, sent me all information about bus and train and walking tour in Toledo so we just enjoyed our trip üòä üòäüòã

Jaime has been one of my best couch surfers ever. He is clean, thoughful and mature. We spoke a lot about life, design, existence, football and Nietzsche. Very interesting guy. He also loves canarian reggae. I don't judge people. I had the sensation that I could even be working with him. No doubt: a person I would host on and on. Be water my friend.

it was my first couchserfing time, and it was a great pleasure that Jamie offered me his help. thanks a lot, this time was unforgettable! ok, i will tell u why. first of all, Jamie send me tips how to go to his place, then we saw some videos on Youtube and walked around. i had an opportunity to check real Madrid, those parts which is not for tourists. watching tv shows was nice too. and he has the best dog i've ever seen! totally recommended and thounds of my 'thank you' :)

Awesome stay, I really recommend it. My friend arrived the evening before me and he gladly hosted her and even helped to pick me up way too late than what anyone could ask. His dog is the cutes thing ever but what‚Äôs makes the stay nice is the owner, he‚Äôs chilled out and you feel completely relaxed around him. Our night out was a lot of fun for someone who loves dancing and looking forward to meet somewhere soon again! Thank you for making my first impression of Madrid wonderful!

Jaime was an awesome host who was very understanding when our plane was delayed and we showed up later than expected. He respected our privacy but was also super fun to hang out with especially the night out was very cool. He has a super cute dog named Toby, which is an extra plus. I would definitely recommend Jaime and would stay with him anytime :)

Jaime was a great host! He cooked me a delicious tradicional Spanish dinner and we had some great wine as well. He showed me how to get around the city and we also had good conversations.  It was just one night, but I would def stay with him again. His apartment is really neat and clean, good location too. Thanks a lot for hosting me!

Since my friend had to cancel the trip last minute I was considering not coming neither but the decision to come was the best I could do. My stay in Madrid with Jaime was just simply unforgottable! Jaime was super super nice host and we had a lot of fun (and drinks :)) together. He even came to pick me up from the airport since my flight was quite late, he has showed me his favourite places to hang-out, great places to eat, must see spots and he even introduced me to his friends who were also very nice and friendly. We cooked together and enjoyed some homemade aperol spritz on the terrace of his super nice apartment. :) I had a proper Madrid experience including sightseeing, amazing food, delicious wine, siesta, fiesta and spanish temperament all around. I would definitelly recommend to stay with Jaime. Thank you once again for everything and you know you are more than wlecome to stay at my place anytime. :)

Jaime was my first host in Madrid. Unfortunately he had to work so we only spoke in the evenings and we didn't have time to visit the city together. He's very polite, his appartment is beautiful and very well located!
Jaime is an incredible host! He was such a great help to me during my stay in Madrid. Wish there could be more hosts like him!!!
That was a pleasure to stay by Jaime.  My friend and I appreciate so much this good luck to get to know the person like him . You definitely  can rely on Jaime. Totally recommended !
I'd totally recommend staying with jaime! He is very friendly and his home is beautiful. He even picked me up from the airport. Thanks a lot Jaime!

Jaime is a very nice guy, so thoughtful and easy going. I enjoyed a lot staying at his place, that is comfortable, clean and organized; we spend a Sunday together, visiting Madrid and trying the best selection of dishes (he has a very good taste in food and wine btw). I recommend him without doubt!
Amable. Bastante amigable. Very polite. Nice person.
I stayed with Jaime for one night while in Madrid and he is a very nice person, we had a Spanish dinner made by him which was absolutely delicious!

text: I would really recommend to stay with this guy! He is smart, friendly, helpful, attentive, has a great taste for music, also a good dancer (sadly, he is too shy to admit it :)) The time flies quickly listening to him talking about travelling adventures, etc. The apartment is really lovely, clean, once you there you feel like at home. Jaime was awesome!! His home is beautiful and it was great that he had a car since it was so cold and rainy when I was in Madrid. We had really great food and wine and the couch was very comfortable! I hope to see Jaime again in LA or madrid!! :)

We stayed two nights at Jamie¬¥s home. He made our stay in Madrid really nice and comfortable, gave us  recommonandations where to go and what to see, muchas gracias! We had really nice conservations, watched a movie together, cooked together and he went out with us to a really nice club. It¬¥s was really nice getting to know him and we can highly recommend staying with him. Really nice Couchsurfing experience, thanks a lot! :)

If you are not sure, I will certanatly recommend to stay with Jaime:))
Despite being ill, he went with us to the city centre, part of the city he showed by the foot , then  by the car :) we were walking a lot ) 
Moreover, we were cooking a dinner together- national Spanish dinner :) it was really nice experience:) furthermore, Jaime showed us huge amount of emotional videos and we also enjoyed the time that we have spent together during our relaxing and tasting food in the evening:))
His apartment is clean and full of different bright things inside:))) 
So,to sum up we were happy to stay with him and have really pleasant feeling after visiting him and Madrid:))

Jaime was very understanding person, because my trip to Madrid was unexpected , and I had no time and access to Internet to find a couchsurf . So I sent him request in the evening and he accepted it in 1 hour o less, although I didn't have any references! 
Jaime is interesting person , he travels a lot , so he can share his experience with you. we found a lot to talk aboutüôÇ
He has a very nice and cozy apartment decorated by himself . 
Jaime, thanks a lot and always welcome to Moscow!

My bus was over an hour late getting to Madrid, so I was extremely late to meet Jaime at his home, and had no wifi to communicate with him, but he was very understanding and kind! His home is beautiful, and his couch is so comfortable. More importantly, he was very friendly, interesting to talk to and welcoming! I really enjoyed spending time with him in the evening when he wasn't working. Unfortunately he wasn't able to join me as I explored the city, but he gave me wonderful advice on where to go! So happy to have met him :)

Jaime and I couldn't hang out much as I was in Madrid over the week. Though he was very nice and gave me recommendations about the mains spots to visit and how to get around in the city. Thank you for hosting me Jaime!

Jaime is a great host, I stay in his house in Madrid for 2 days and was great. He gave me helpful advices of what to visit, we went together to the stadium of Real Madrid and to other nice places. His apartment is really nice, everything clean and classy. If you can host Jaime or stay with him don't hesitate in doing it!

It is great luck to have Jaime as host! He is very friendly, nice and interesting person. Jaime showed us the night life of Madrid, we were watching movies together, sunbathing on the terrace and having dinner. We had a lot of fun!:) The flat is very clean and comfortable, great location. Metro is a ten minute walk. My friend Anna and I have private room and bathroom. We have a great time with Jaime! :) P.S. Jaime, you are the best host! And we are the best travelers, aren't we?)))

text:
Oh, wow, what to say about this Olivia! Easy going, open minded, full of joy. Those kind of people you want to have around. She lent me her cozy beautiful room in Stockholm after knowing me for such a short time.
Give yourself the pleasure of meeting her and have a great time together, because I am sure that is the only thing that could happen when Olivia is involved. I am so lucky to live in the same city as her now, so please Olivia, keep being in my sorroundings :D
Very sociable, interested in the meeting new friends

Jos√© is a top bloke! The perfect guest and a fantastic Couchsurfer. Great communication before and arrived on time. 
It was such a real pleasure to host him in my flat in Barcelona. He is clean and tidy. Fun to hangout with, but also completely independent so was happy to do his own thing when I was busy with work or other things. 
We shared meals, explored the city, walked in the mountains, went to some fun bars for a beer or two. Loved when his cousin and wife joined us one night and they showed me a great cava bar, and then I showed them my favourite cocktail bar. 
He is a person that I instantly free comfortable with, and can talk and joke all the time.  Thanks for the present you bought from Madrid! 

100% recommend to everyone on Couchsurfing. Cant wait til our paths cross again.

Jos√© was a great host! I stayed 2 nights with him. His place is in a nice location just 5 minutes away the metro station and he has a lovely apartment. We shared some meals together and we hang out in his place. He‚Äôs a nice guy to talk to and full of energy. I would definitely crash in his place again when I visit Madrid. 
Muchas gracias Jos√©. Fue un placer conocerte.

I stayed another two days with jose. He Showed me his house at the countryside. It was one of the Moments i will never forget in life. Jose showed me the real spanish country Life, he knows how to cook(He cooked a Dinner for me) and the next day he showed me the village and introduced me to the villagers. I even got to know his donkey, it was amazing.

Jose was was the best host i have ever met. I had the feeling that i had known him for a long Time, he gives you a really secure feeling and he takes big care about his guests. He is funny. He has a special kind of humour(sometimes ambigious), But when you get used to it you will be able to understand him very well. I would recommend everybody to host him or to be his guest.  I wish you all the best jose and i hope you will visit my place(Hamburg) your are welcome any Time. May god bless you.

Jos√© was my knight in shining armor in Madrid. I posted an emergency request on the city‚Äôs last minute group, and he pulled me in out of the rain. I am so grateful that we met, as he is such a kind and humble man. I didn‚Äôt have nearly enough time with him, but the time I did spend with him was full of great conversation, laughter and delicious food. You cannot ask for anything more from a couchsurfing host or a friend. I would recommend anyone stay with him, or host him if you have the chance.  He is fantastic company.  
Thank you again Jos√©, I will see you next time my friend.

What can I say about Jose... Written language simply isn't enough to describe this inspiring, kind, and cheerful soul. Jose welcomed me in on very short notice and made me feel so very welcome in his cozy and warm home. He had a separate room already prepared for me and was willing to wait up for me when I arrived at midnight. Then we chatted over a couple of beers for what only seemed like a few minutes but was actually an hour.  Without even trying, Jose makes you feel like you've been longtime friends or a pen pal you've had since middle school and now you finally meet. And just look at the date he joined CS and look at how many references and friends he has had in such a short time. Don't just take my word for it, go meet him. Enjoy a beer and make a lifelong friend.

Thank you, Jose. You are one of the most exemplary couchsurfers I have ever met.

text:
I stayed two nights at Jose‚Äôs house. I will remember them forever. I was so lucky to see not only Madrid‚Äôs attractions and building sites and multiculture aspect, but also meet one of the best person in my life. Jose was more of angel than a man who was very generous and welcoming host and flexible. He actually received me very late, although he had to go to work very early in the next morning. This was my first Couchsurfing experience and it was just AMAZING. I will definitely be looking forward to be in Madrid again and stay in Jose‚Äôs house. Hey Jose thank you from A to Z.

Jose is such a kind and compassionate person.  He is definitely the best Couchsurfing host I have had thus far.  From the moment I arrived he was incredibly hospitable and welcoming.  I unfortunately came down with some kind of food poisoning which left me bed ridden and quite sick for the entire time I was there.  He was more than generous in trying to help me feel better and even took me on a midnight pharmacy run despite the fact that he had to work early the next morning.   His house is quite clean and his couch was very comfortable to sleep on as well......Jose, you're truly a legend my brother!!! I hope I'm feeling better next time I come to Madrid.  Ciao

Jos√© is a man among men, a true gentleman. He's extremely kind, funny, and intelligent. He gave me a walking tour of Madrid for 5 hours and showed me tons of sights when I arrived in the city. The next day, we went to a museum together and he showed me even more of Madrid. He was also very patient with my imperfect Spanish (we did speak Spanish for 11 hours though, so it's not that imperfect!), and our conversations gave me confidence to speak Spanish more in Spain. I truly gained a new friend in Jos√© and I appreciate the relationship we built in such a short time. If you have the opportunity to visit Madrid, stay with Jos√© - but do yourself a favor and get to know him; if you don't, you'll miss out on one of the best interactions and experiences of your life. 

Jos√©, gracias por tu hospitalidad. Quiero seguir hablando contigo en el futuro y ojal√° vengas a verme a California o vuelva a verte Madrid.

My experience with Jose was awesome! He is very kind and generous, we kept very good communication before my arrival, he picked me up in train station which was very nice (specially because I already know the city and could easily arrive his place), he lives very close to center of Madrid and his place is easily arrivable by subway/bus, and he has a comfortable and clean house.
I had some work meetings during my stay and he had to work but we could share a lot of things on our free time,  we walked around the city, and he was so nice to take me to Sierra de Guadarrama, where we did a 3-4 hrs trekking, that place is beautiful, and is very special to go into nature with him as he is soooo knowledgeable about flora and fauna; but we also talked about very different topics, he is very open minded and likes very much to share time with his surfers.
Is amazing how many surfers has he hosted in just one year, so he has the experience of a pioneer couch surfer!!!
Thank you for everything Jose. You are welcome to surf in Barcelona, saludos amigo!

text: Wow wow wow Jaime was just..wow! Such a nice, polite, fun and friendly guy! He came in Zaragoza for a concert and he stayed at my place just one night but it was enough to get to know him. From the first moment you could feel the good flow and positive vibes, so it wasn't a problem for me and for my flatmates  to consider him not just as a guest but as a friend so we kind of showed him how "normal" we are and I think he fastly tried to adjust to our "normal" and to our "house rules". He was good cook, a great teacher in Spanish and almost as good in trying to learn some words in "weird" Eastern languages. text: Antwone was a wonderful host.  We explained so much about the city and was willing to give me a tour of the city center. He was very generous in letting me book a stay at his place last minute after I noticed scheduled my hostel incorrectly. Antwone is a very interesting person to talk to, and has considerable knowledge about Silicon Valley , the basis on which his new book is written. The location of his place is also awesome and is basically at the center of Madrid. Many thanks, Antwone!

Staying with Antwone was really a great pleasure! I am not only amazed by his broader knowledge, but also his practice of the way approaching it. We had a lot of deep conversations, and definitely it was the greatest part of staying at his cozy studio. Since Antwone just got his recent book published, and it is very interesting to have a chance talking to the author directly, it was a privilege!  Antwone is really a respectful and humble guy, we had many sincere conversations about life, society, philosophy, and history. 
@ Antwone, thank you so much for having a chance to know you! You definitely made my trip here in Madrid more meaningful!

I had an amazing time with Antwone. We talked about life and exchange each other's stories. Antwone is a very inspiring guy and after a conversation with him I felt amazing. His flat is amazing too, located in the center of the city. I definitely recommend Antwone to everyone. Thank you bro, it was amazing to meet you and talk:)

My dear Antoine is a unique unique individual. In my opinion he is some you can steal horses with as long as you can connect. But if you do, I believe that you will not only discover wonderful things about him but also about yourself. Writing a reference sounds a bit weird after all the things we have experienced together but I will be a bit more "formal" so couch surfers know What to "expect".
Antoine is a must hangout if you are an individual who is keen to experience new things. He will give you the space and is very communiactive as long as you express what you want/don't want. He thinks out of the box and every conversation appears to be widening ones horizon. He knows the city very well and has a great knowledge of history of the city and the best p.aces to go to (I think night life is notincluded-clubs). We certainly will maintain our relationship and I believe there are not my people who will be fortunate enough to meet him here on CS as I believe, that he is accomplishing a big piece of art that he'll share with the world.

Be safe hermano

Antwone saved my ass ! 
I had a host cancel on me and Antwone, as the angel he is, was willing to host last minute. Thank you! 

I arrived and Antwone was super friendly and welcoming. The space is very unique and beautiful it's a Garret or renovated attic space with all the amenities besides a kitchen. For a surfer you couldn't ask for more it's so peaceful, warm and full of creative energy. 

I really recommend staying with Antwone or taking him out for a meal or coffee to grow your understanding of purpose of life, how to create, spiritual guidance and great local food joints in Madrid. He's a busy hard working guy but maybe you can catch him in the morning or at night.

You're always welcome to stay with me in Los Angeles! When you're ready to take the journey there again I'll be waiting. I am excited for you to grow your work and convert the book to English, I'll be read to buy and read when it's done. I can't wait.
Peace and love ! Hugs and kisses
Andrew

I got to Madrid without a place to stay, so the first day is a long story. Then Antwone messaged and invited me to check out the city and we found lots of things in common. 

He let me stay in his place and not only that but we had the greatest times talking til late at night, sharing music, helping each other and going to a festival. He's a great person if you're looking for a unique experience rather than just a tourism trip huge heart and great open mind. Best guy I met in Madrid if that sums it all up better.

P.d. His place should be called an exclusive museum in Madrid. Just saying

Antwone was awesome we met at his home and left my luggage there.. Floppy was very happy to see me üòÉ
there was another guy from Mexico waiting for me then we walked all around the city and we talked about a lot of things like politics and religion.. he showed me an Egyptian temple in Madrid that I didn't know it was there that was really surprising.. at the end of day we went to the place ur gonna stay at which is so cozy beautiful and warm .. I'm no so talkative but Antwone made me be some kind. Hope to  see u again in egypt or Spain brother ‚ù§Ô∏èüòÉ

Antonio has and is living a very interesting live of constant development and improvement. He did a lot of remarkable things in his life and I'm sure there are a lot of those to come. He really dedicates himself to his work, other people, himself and his values. This makes it an interesting experience to stay with him and I can just recommend it to anyone that wants to share and learn from the experiences of someone who knows his place in this world very well. My stay with Antonio was nothing short of magical. Although I arrived via plane very late in the night antonio waited for me at his attic and we had a tree hour conversation getting to know each other. Immediately Antonio has the ability to make you feel as though you've known him a lifetime. He's an amazing artist combining multiple different medias. His work is nothing short of amazing. I was absolutely amazed at how much time he was willing to dedicate just to make sure my stay was truly spectacular. It is truly one of the best experiences I have ever had. We also did lot of stuffs together, like going for tortilla de papa con ca√±a, chocolate con porras and even to eat the 12 grapes with cava for the final test of the Old Night (NY) celebration in Puerta del Sol (main spot of the city), just one block and a half away from his place.

text:
Antonio is a great host. He received me in his house with some typical Spanish lunch, we had many good conversations, a walk around the city, and I can most certainly say that Madrid would not having been so good without Antonio as a host. The attic was the most unique place I've ever been hosted at, and it was a great couchsurfing experience. I'd like to wish you all the luck and success with your projects, and I'm waiting for my signed copy of the book :)

Thanks a lot
Gabriel

I stayed in his cool flat for 4 days and his house is so clean, comfortable and anyway good location for sightseeing. I had a great time with him and his dog. Antonio is beautiful person, the good vibes were totally infectious, he was relaxed, warm and hospitable which made me feel relaxed at all times. We went to downtown and histrionic area of Madrid. We were able to share many things and experiences. Especially, I shared Japanese green tea, Matcha. I want to see him and his dog again. I'm waiting for you to visit my country, Japan. Thank you for everything, Antonio! Let's keep in touch! See you soon!

It was my first Couchsurfing experience and I will never forget it, because I spent two amazing days with Antonio, full of interesting conversations and moments! He is a very special person with a lot of talents, very caring, respectful, sophisticated, full of joy, creativity and enthusiasm - a true inspiration!  Go and enjoy your time with the King of Internet! :) 
Looking forward meeting you again in future! 
P.S. I totally loved his super cute and friendly doggy - Lobby <3

My stay with Antonio was my first Couchsurfing experience and it will surely be difficult to top. For starters, the location of his studio is in a prime location in Puerta del Sol. It was simple to get to and from anywhere in the city by walking (or by train). 

Antione was the most gracious host and he even waited super late for me to arrive due to a late flight. We started by having a 2 hour conversation to get to know each other. After that we spent time together everyday, whether by him showing me the "Real Artistic Madrid", having dinner at his house, or sharing wonderful creative moments together. 

I definitely can't imagine having a better first experience in Madrid and Antonio is a soul that I can never forget and will be glad to know for the rest of my life.

I lived with Ignacio for 3 days and it was wonderful! We had a great time in chess. Every morning Ignacio left breakfast, and it was interesting because I like to cook, and I was wondering what a typical Spanish breakfast is.
In addition, it is very tasty, and if you like food, I recommend taking a rycept.
In addition, he knows the city very well and showed me part of the center on the first day! It was very interesting!
Unfortunately, I had very little time in Madrid, and I did not have time to visit all the places, museums and exhibitions.
I very much hope that next time I will be able to see most of Madrid.
And, of course, I have to say that Ignacio is a great person, after flying and climate change, my acclimatization began with my body, and he gave me the opportunity to get enough sleep, and on the last day he spent me in the airport. Haha, you are the first to take me to the airport! Thank you so much for these few days! Hope we will meet again!

text: Staying with Karim was really really nice! He was incredible in picking me up at the airport! I stayed one night with him and we shared a nice meal, good music and an amazing conversation. He really is an interesting person, very available and nice. I totally recommend to stay with him and will definitely host him when I have the chance. Thank you for everything, Karim! :)
I was with Karim for 3 nights. We didn't hang out much but when we did he was friendly and was interesting to talk to. He also made me feel at home as well.

Karim was an excellent host! He taught me a bit of Spanish and helped us on the way to the airport. We really felt at home and we had no problem. We had a great time together, we drank some beers and tried the traditional Madrid food! Thank you Karim for all the time you dedicated us, you are a great friend! I wait for you in Brazil!

Sam was an amazing host. He is very friendly, kind and smart guy. From the beginning he sent me a video showing the flat, was helping since I've arrived to the airport, took care all the time and let me stay one extra night. Highly recommend üòä 
P.S: he's a great cook, and wish you good luck with ur blogging ü§ûüòâ

It was my first experience to use CS and honestly I am so happy,that my first host was Sam,because first of all  as a person Sam is really very nice,intelligent,interesting and friendly.Sexondly,flat was so clean,bright,and I felt myself like I am at home.I enjoyed time that i had in Madrid,I felt myself welcome.Maybe if i hadn‚Äôt such experience to be hosted by Sam,my emotions and feelings about Madrid could be in another way.so,I am very thankful for Sam‚Äôs hospitality.

Sam was really kind and helpful since the begining. He came to pick us up late in the evening. Having no chance to buy any food, he shared his dinner with us, even had some homemade cake! Yum-yum! We talked for hours even though all of us were pretty tired, but it was so much fun we could not stop talking. (Maybe it was the wine? :‚ÄôD) He gave us advices about the city, what to see and what to eat. Also shared a lot about his travels, interests and plans. I loved all the things he showed us having from India. Thanks for your kindness! 
I subscribed to your YouTube channel, waiting for the new content to come. :)) 
The monkeys are waiting for you in Budapest! See you there Sam!
Jose is a very friendly and flexible guy, really happy to meet him!

I had the chance to host Jos√© for one night, he's a vey nice guy. Met him after work with a couple of other couchsurfers for drinks. We laughed a lot, shared our experiences and stories. He is very tidy, clean and independent. He is open minded and knowledgeable. I totally recommend hosting him and he is welcome anytime.

Jose and me could only spend very little time. I'd be happy to meet up another time again! :)
He's a very friendly, respectful, authentic and open-minded person, who's open to talk about his thoughts about his life and the world which is very interesting! It's very comfortable to be in his company. 
I hope you enjoyed the rest of your time in Cologne! All the best for you :)
Having Jos√© to stay was great. He stayed only one night as he was just passing through, but we went to see some music, had a few drinks and chatted a lot. It was great to get to know him briefly!

Jose is a really nice person. Open-minded, flexible and easy going. I really enjoyed his stay. Interesting talks and a beautiful walk through Granada. He is trustful and honest, I would host him again :)
We are ai glad of meeting him;) he is really open minded and showed us a lot of beautiful places to visit in Spain, hope to see u again one day;)
Jose was like my brother, he took care of me ;) I felt very comfortable. I liked to discuss about  peaple's relationship.

Jose stayed one night at my place. He is a really nice, outgoing and interesting guy who has a lot of cool stories to tell. We enjoyed some drinks at my place together with some other guests. Would definitely recommend to host him if you get the chance.
Jose and his cousin stayed here for 1 night, they are very interesting and polite and it was nice talking to them.

text:
We met at a cultural Peer project and since then I've been invited at many crazy parties/diners at Jose's house. He's alway very welcoming and fun. Hosting and showing Jose around in the Netherlands was fun and interesting as well. 
He joined my mothers family during a christmas diner, this is what she said about him afterwards: 'He is easy going within a group of unknown people. He helps when ever he can, he is open, friendly and knows where he stands.'
inverseReference:
{'id': '10308092', 'text': "I met her in person in a Scottish project to join people to do different fun activities. Also she hosted me in The Netherlands at Christmas day with all her family! It was awesome to know another culture in that special day.
You can have a lot of fun with her. She likes dance, cycle, meetings with food, ,going out,etc... 
As you can see a strange picture as a Annemarie's couch, that's me on the floor of her flat but I'm not a comfortable couch so you have to sleep in the normal one ;D.

text: Hosted Jose and a mate of his at our place in Belfast for a night in April. Both of them were great guys, very open and friendly and easy to have a good chat with about travelling, sports, life in general. They turned up at ours quite late on a saturday with a few beers and bottles of wine. Obviously up for bit of a party. Brought them out to a local bar and had great craic with them. I think they were trying to get me drunk buying me drinks all night. Appreciate it guys. I'll definitely be getting in touch with Jose if/when I'm over in Edinburgh. He is a fairly big fella though so make sure you have a king size bed!!
inverseReference:
{'id': '9927439', 'text': 'Paddy was a perfect host. Carlos and me arrived late in the night to his place with a couple of bottles of wine, and after a really nice chatting with him and his flatmate, everything finished in an amazing pub meeting a lot of people and having a lot of fun.

text:

Probably more interested in people than in places or himself. 
He wakes up every morning at 4am for work and never woke me up. Definitely one of the best couchsurfers in Edinburgh

text: I was very happy to stay at Jose. We had a conscious conversation and drank a beer. Jose is a very educated and interesting person. Thank you body!

He is very caring and considerate and made sure I had everything that I needed. He‚Äôs just an overall great person! Thanks, Jose!

Jose is a super nice host. He is extremely polite and kind. He had the best advices for me about Madrid and his place is located in very nice area where you can really feel like a local. He spend all his free time with me which I really appreciated. We had some really great conversations and he was overall just great company!

Jose hosted me and my friend for two nights.  He was very nice and welcoming. We spent some time together and he showed us around and also gave us a map of the city with detailed description of what we could do when he had to go to work. His roommate was also very nice! The room was very clean and the location of the house is very central! Would definitely stay again if I was in Madrid.

Jos√© was the best!!!! Super great guy willing to hang out and sharing good conversation! Happy to have a new friend!

Jose is a great host; very friendly, talkative, flexible, thoughtful:) He also has a very friendly flatmate! I felt very comfortable staying in their living room for two nights. Thanks Jose for being so welcoming & for the courgette/goat cheese quiche :)

Jose is great person. He was willing to give his attention to me as a guest. We spent some time together and he showed me around, took me some cool places. I saw an exhibition about Nelson Mandela thanks to him and it was great. He also took me a place serving great tapas and gave me some tips about Madrid. He was a great host also I felt like at home. His room mate is also a nice guy who is easy to talk. I would like to meet them again when I am coming to Madrid. Thanks for everything Jose! I had great time with you!

Jose was a true definition of the couchsurfing spirit - hospilatary, friendly, respectful and interested in sharing experiences. Even though I had lived in Madrid before, we managed to squeeze in to the one day an activity I had never done before - cycling in the centre of the city with electric bikes. Our communication was always easy. The apartment is neat and very well communicated. 
Thank you for letting me stay in your place and welcome to Finland anytime! :)

Jose is a really thoughtful person. Me and Ioana had a flight to Madrid on 23rd og July in the night and we sent a request for he night of 24th. He was kind enough to invite us in the middle of the night at 3 AM and saved us from sleeping at the airport or wandering around the city at night. Couldn't thank him enough for it! 

He told us about cheap tapas near his place and in the evening he spent time with us and show us around the city. He's very well traveled and has a lot of stories. The next day he drove us on the highway as we were hitchhiking our way out to Portugal. Double savior! 
You were the best, dude! Really hope to meet again! 
Cheers!

text:
Jose was wonderful to myself and my friend, Chan. When we arrived after traveling he made us feel welcome and comfortable. He made us a meal and took us on a mini tour of Barcelona before taking us to a concert. We met his friends and family, who were wonderful and kind. Although he was busy with work, he arranged his schedule so that he could spend time with us. He is kind, sweet, funny, hospitable, considerate and thoughtful. His home is cute, clean and comfortable; we also had our own bedroom which was nice! I could go on about how wonderful our stay with him was! We thoroughly enjoyed our time with Jose, his friends and his beautiful home!  If you have a chance to hangout with this lad, don't pass the chance by! 
Also--Come visit us in Canada Jose!
Con mucho cari√±o,
Denica (y Chan) x

We went out two times and meet some of his friends and other couchsurfers. Was really fun! He gave us lots of tips for sightseeing in Madrid. We would stay with him again.

text:

√Ålex: thank you very much for eating together with you and your girlfriend. The food was very good! 
I  highly recommend staying at Alex' house. He is an easy going person to whom it's a lot of fun to talk to.

Alex = a lot of fun and quality time and his sofa is quite comfortable!

text:
I stayed at Julen's house for two days, and i've spent really good moments with him and his funny friends! we shared meals togheter, walked around the city and above all talked a lot about everything. 
Julen is a very nice, honest guy and he's very generous!He's funny and knows a lot of things on arts and archeologism,i had really a good time listening to all of his tales form all around the world!Very interesting! 
He helps you with everything and and wants you to feel at home, offering you everything that you may need. I didn't go out at night time, but he was absolutely cool if i did and stayed out all night! He helped with directions, and gave me advice on what to do and see in Madrid. Hope to have the chance of spending more time with him next time i will go to Madrid! :)

text:
I was in a hurry and very worried before going to Madrid. It was very difficult to find a couch at that moment. When, in the last minute, Julen opened his doors to me. Offered me not only a couch, but a home. Honouring the Couchsurfing idea, he shared his thoughts, knowledge and helped me to create good memories. 
Adem√°s, es una persona muy simp√°tica y inteligente, con qui√©n puedes charlar por a√±os y, asimos, tendr√° algo nuevo a aprender. Se te gusta historia, especialmente la romana, Julen es el experto. 
Mas all√° de arque√≥logo, es un gran masajista. Me ha ofrecido una masaje fenomenal, que dej√≥ nuevo despu√©s de tanto estr√©s con las viajes. 
We had a really good time together. A lot of fun, mixed with jokes and serious talks, resulting in the best experience I could get in my last week in Europe.
Gracias por todo amigo, sepa que lo pase muy bien.

No te olvides de decirme cu√°ndo vienes a Brasil, puedes quedarte en mi casa!

Abrazo fuerte!

text:
Supernova in the sky of an experience. Julen is one of those couchsurfing hosts that restores your faith in what it means to be a couchsurfer--to be moved by the kindness of strangers and the ability, even across different languages and cultures, to find friendship in the most foreign of places. He welcomes you into his home not only as his guest, but as his family and the experience is a wonderful one. Patient, intelligent, comic and hospitable to an all new level. 

Not to mention the fact that Julen is a charmer, the suavist of the suave, the most poignant of the passionate, with eyes and eyebrows that could take down wildebeasts. How any lady could resist him, I'm not sure. 

Quatro cien por ciento de una experiencia increiblemente chevere! Esto hombre es un hombre entre ninos, un montana entre colinitas, el guapissomo, el elegantissimo, el siete maravillas de mundo en una lugar.

Mi tiempo con Julen fue mas que genial, fue sublime. Seras el bienvido en mi casa cuandoquiere, amigo

text:
There is not much to add about Julen after everything that is written here.
Julen is a very cool& easy going guy,
he welcomed me into his home very naturally & generously and i had a wonderful long time with him! i was lucky to meet his friends &taste his great pasta.
if you understand spanish you will probably laugh a lot since he have a very special sense of humor.
Julen is not a casual couchsurfing experience&he will never let you feel unwanted.when he tells you "Esta bien" be sure it's gonna be "Esta bien"!
he really likes the number 24 ,a lot of softener in the washing machine and his location is a great bonus cause it is just prime.
I hope to see you in Israel my Friend!
i'm sure we gonna meet again somewhere.
Thanks for everything !!! :)

text: Im very happy I got to meet Giseth and stay in his very cosy home in a very beautiful neighbourhood. He was very helpful with things to do and where to eat. He met me at the station when I arrived and cooked me a very nice meal just before I left :-)

Giseth is very polite and interesting person. He was very busy and we see each other only in the morning before he left home.  He gave me the keys from his house and I feel very comfortable.

Giseth is a good host! Though he had a lot of work he still hosted me for 2 days (but I requested only 1) which is very important. Giseth, thank you for hosting me, hope to see you again some day and hang out, may be in Ukraine! :)

I'm pleasured that I stayed in Madrid with such good man as Giseth. He is easy-going, intelligent and nice person.
The thing I liked the most is that Giseth gave me keys of his apartments and for me it means totally confidence.
We cooked some food together and it was very tasty. Giseth is a about tasty food and good wine, for sure.
Giseth's place is about not more than 10 minutes by foot from city center of Madrid. And it's perfect to explore the city quickly, because all sights are nearby to home. You will like the view from the window as I liked it much.
Even he was busy(he was working really hard) during my visit, we had opportunity to know a lot of interesting things from each other and I practised my Spanish too.
I hope we will meet together with Giseth more. 

I highly recommend Giseth as a host and I would like to host you in Ukraine, you're welcome to my home!

Great guy. Nice and polite. Ho does really love to help other travellers to enjoy the city and the time there. Sense of humor.

Giseth was an absolute pleasure to stay with. He was an incredibly smart and friendly guy who seemed eager to learn new things and meet new people. He is definitely a busy man but somehow finds time to be a great host as well. His new apartment was in an amazing location and he made dinner for the two of us when we got home. Giseth is an open-minded and very friendly person. He knows and lives the spirit of couchsurfing. I even got the flat keys so I could come and go as I wanted. He was more than a pleasant host - you couldn't wish for any better! :)

I don¬¥t think I can praise Giseth enough here! Super chill dude! At first, he invited me to hang out with him and his friends over Couchsurfing, and when I told him that I don¬¥t have a bed for tomorrow yet, he did not hesitate to offer me one at his place! Giseth was an amazing host. He gave me keys to his new home and was very generous.

i was very grateful that Giseth accepted to host me, since it was quite spontaniously. He is very respectful and I appreciated to could have joined him and his two funny friends to have dinner out on the first night there. muchas gracias y tendras siempre una casa en Berna! :)

I must admit that I felt like a privileged person in Madrid just because of him. He is very busy man and yet he takes time to make your staying comfortable as much as possible. You quickly realize that he loves cooking and travelling. So, if you want to make him a day; now you know how.
What was so memorable during staying at his place?! For me, spending time with him and his friends, and of course, his kindness.
However, in addition I enjoyed spending time in his company because we both like the word 'tranquilidad' and to reap the benefits from it  :-D

Giseth, hope to see you soon!

Giseth is a very caring person, even that his work make him busy enough.

Giseth, much success in your business, I hope to meet you again some day! Thank you for everything :)

Giseth is a great host, he accepted me on the last minute and he helped me out on my first days in Madrid. He's friendly and a cool person to talk with, and his hospitality is amazing, I can only wish that all hosts were like him! Giseth, when you come back from Greece, I'm buying you a beer!

Giseth is an amazing host, really friendly and easygoing guy and an amazing cooker (he cooked an amazing caribbean recipe).

He knows where to go in Madrid and where to find amazing food in the city. 
Thanks to host me and thanks to your tips. 
Un saluto, amico mio.

text:
Thank you for hosting me during my stay in Madrid. It was pleasure to meet you. 

Fernando is a friendly, open, responsible person. He travelled to many countries and can share with you his memories about them and tell you some interesting facts about Spain. 

He offered me his couch. He knows well his district and the city. He also was trying to speak Spanish with me as long as i wanted to practice it. We also went together with his friend to salsa party and it was cool.

Fernando is very intelligent and careful person) unfortunately, I didn‚Äôt have much time to spend with Fernando, but definitely he is very positive and helpful) There many topics to discuss- especially about history and culture of different countries)  thank you so much for help !) ‚ò∫Ô∏è

I spent a great time in Madrid with Fernando! He is such a nice person and always ready to help you and cheer you up. It was actually my first couchsurfing experience as a guest. 
Thank you for showing me around the city, interesting places and events and food of course)) and spend some time with me. 

Best wishes, 
Julia.

Had a great 3 night stay with Fernando and at the last minute too. This was my first couchsurfing experience it was good to meet Fernando, he is a salsa dancer as am I so he took me out to a cool club and out for African food after, places I wouldn't know existed! He was very helpful with directions, telling me fun stuff to do in the city etc. His flat is also cosy, clean and couch is super comfy! Also well located in a nice area only 10 mins to Centro by Metro. Thanks for your hospitality üòä

Fernando hosted me in Madrid and it was one of my best CS experiences! Fernando is not only a very interesting person who can tell you a lot about his city and show new places but also a person who is ready to help you with everything you need: to feed you, help with the taxi and everything :) we've spent a beautiful day in the park, in the museum Tabacqueria and have also seen Picasso's Guernica. text: Felix hosted me for one night and I really enjoyed my stay. His home is close to the city centre so it's pretty convenient. The first night I arrived later than it was planned but he still picked me up from the Metro station. Next day Felix showed me the most beautiful places in Madrid, was friendly and easy to talk to. I definitely recommend staying with Felix!

Felix was friendly and very accommodating. His flat mate Gaeton was wonderful too! I arrived a bit late at night, but Felix still met me at the train stop and helped me lug my suitcase. While I was on my own during the day (as I arrived on a weekday), I was able to hang out with Gaeton and Felix at night. Both of them were very flexible with me and I was happy to stay in their home. They are both very welcome to visit me either in NYC or California! Merci bien!
It was fun skating with him! He is a nice man & he cooks delicious Venezuelan food!!! üòÜ

SOOOO NICE !!! 
He welcomed me so well in his flat I can't even thanks him enough. I was super tired and I had the safest and most confortable night ever.

Karelle

text: So nothing to complain about the guy. But we diden't realy got to hang out. :D mabe see each other :P

Manuel is a great guest. He is very cool, calm, clean, enjoys smart conversations, and is a very friendly and good person overall. We had a good time walking around Sofia sightseeing and talking. I enjoyed having him as a guest and it would be a pleasure to host him again in the future should he ever come back. :).  
Best of luck and hope to be seeing you again soon.

An enchanting person with a lovely personality. It's nice to discover that there are people that have the same "bad" sense of humor as yours.  Sincerely, I wish everyone had Manuels' skills in the art of making witty jokes with a touch a cynicism but also honest that you feel like there is no going back once you start a simple conversation with him.  And he has a lot to say if you are willing to listen. 
I can see he loves traveling and will spend, probably, half his life doing it and that's great and contagious. I like his open-mindedness and easy going attitude and also the familiarity that I felt when talking to him.   
Thank you for cooking those delightful meals! He respected my house, my rules (although I don't have many) and also was ok with spending much of his time here alone because his host had to work. Manuel is one guest that I would truly like to meet again. An absolutely wonderful person.  Take care and good luck! :)

During his stay I was too busy, it was a pity for me that I had no more time to spend with Manuel. But in the short discussions that we had it was a pleasure for me to discover what a bright and friendly guy is Manuel!

Manuel is really gentle, friendly and open-minded, perfectly plays the guitar. I enjoyed his company: we spent a wonderful evening by the sea with a guitar, he cooked for me)
Don't miss the chance to meet, host or spend some time with him!üòâ
His will to experiment was memorable, his openness and friendliness.

text: I hosted Manuel in Florina for three nights! Even though we didn't hang out a lot, he was an easy going and nice person! I would definately host him again! Good luck with your journey!! :)

Although I didn't meet Manuel myself, he fit right in the community of travellers sharing my apartment. Communication with him was easy, pleasant and very clear. He always kept me informed. So yes I would host Manuel again !
fromPublicAddressDescription: Thessaloniki, Decentralized Administration of Macedonia and Thrace, Greece

text: Manuel is a wonderful traveler that shares so many interesting stories about his journeys and you should definitely ask him about that. He is an easy going person and for sure you will have good conversations with him. Although I didn't have that much time to spend with him I enjoyed  the music we shared and hope to see him again soon! Manuel, I wish you all the best in your travels!

Manuel is a really traveller!!!We did many conversations about travels and people that he had met in his journeys.He is a very friendly person who likes to know different cultures and habits.Also his cooking is great ,he made for me a very tasty asian meal.Sooo it was a pleasure to meet Manuel ,hope to see him again some time!

Well about Manuel ...He's a nice guy. He followed the house rules n most of all he enjoyed the food that I cooked especially beef rendang. Overall, yes I would like to welcome him again in the future ...for all the host out there if u see Manuel send a request pls accept him coz he's a nice guy humble n easy to talk to..I pray the best will always be with him.

Manuel have been in touch with me when he posted a public trip to KL a month ago but had some change of plans. Now, after a month, he finally decided to go to KL before going back to Europe. And he decided to stay with me.

He is a very knowledgeable guy and one of the most fluent in English Spanish guy I have met. He seemed shy at first but when you get to know him, he really knows what he is saying. We got along really having some similar interests.

A very laidback guy which just goes with the flow. We hanged out, ate dinner together, just enjoying our time and with my other guests. Really an amazing guy!

Have a safe flight back to Europe and hope to see you again!

text: Manuel are really nice and polite. I hosted him for 2 nights. We had a good time and nice talks about everything. It nice to meet you. Come again to Bogor!

Manuel was such a pleasure to hosting starting from the first minute. He was such a great person to talk with. We had a good time and also some really nice talks about everything. For me, it was such a great weekend. I really enjoyed spending my time with him. It was also very nice to listened to his voice while playing guitar eventho i don't really like folk music, but his voice and the way he played the guitar it's just gunna make u feel good. Manuel is also very friendly, easygoing and open minded so, i reckon everyone will get along with him very easily. I definitely recommend Manuel as a guest.
I miss u already! Enjoy ur trip and i hope to see u again soon! x

P.s : Thank u for helping me to pick a good guitar and also changed my guitar strings! :p

Manuel is absolutely a great guy! Hosting him is a must! He is also friendly, cool and down to earth person. At first he planned to stay with me for 2 nights but ended up staying 4 nights, and I don't mind at all because he's a nice and fun guy. We visited some places in Bandung like the famous Braga street, Asia Africa street, Balai Kota, and then we also went to padalarang and went to Hawu Mountain and Stone Garden.

We also talked about well.. basically everything! From couchsurfing experience, culture, religion, movies, and many other things. He's been a great company to talk to. And thank you my friend that you have introduced me to h3h3production, now my life is complete :D

Comeback anytime you want man, you are welcome here.. I really had a good time hanging out with you, I wish you all the best in life and I hope to see you again soon somewhere man! *fistbump*

Manuel stayed in my house for just a day, but Manuel tells a lot about his experience during in mataram, we talk a lot about a job and manuel friend ' boon ' is very friendly and share many stories..

nice to meet you Manuel and Boon I hope we can meet again at another time üôãüôè

Manuel is a cool young man from Spain, you can eat him :D

he can cook and he love my kitties yeayyy :D

I hosted him with his cute friend from Thailand. They are so friendly and easy going persons. They complete eachother, I love them both.

I wish one day I can meet them and watch them fight in the kitchen while I'm seating like a kids waiting their dishes.

Kiss kiss from my kitties

Manuel and boon are very friendly, they are so thoughtful. We share many experiences and they are also give me some information about my next trip. We hang out a lot and have some fun!! Hope we can meet in south or KL.

Manuel and his travel mate, Boon, stayed in my place for a few days. They were independent, respectful and clean. They even helped me cleaning the room, thank you so much for that! We went to the fish market and enjoyed a good time with my friends hanging out around the beach. Overall, I can say that they're nice and friendly.

Till we meet again,
Cheers! :)

It was a pleasure hosting Manuel for 2 nights together with his friend, Boon. They were polite, respectful, clean, and I felt at ease having them around since we are all in the same age group. Dumaguete happened to be their detour because they were discouraged by the unethical feeding of the whalesharks in Oslob. This decision gave me an impression that they care for the natural environment of the animals. We had good conversations, and one can sense that he is creative, full of life and curiosity. It was fascinating how curious we were with Thai dishes since we did our best to cook and made sure it tasted like the real ones. Haha! Would have loved to try some more Thai dishes though if our time permitted. 

I hope you enjoyed their stay in Dumaguete as much as I did. Buen viaje Manuel! See you around soon!

Manuel is an experienced couchsurfer and we felt it. Even when we were still communicating, he is concious and considerate of his host. He told us that he is not that feeling well and asks us if it is okay to host him. When he steped into our house, he already brought some positive vibes as if he is not feeling any illness. He always ask if it is okay to do this and that. He also tries to offer the food that he has especially the avocado. You know what I mean Manuel. Haha. He lets me realise that Spanish food is actually not spicy. I hope you are feeling better now so you can make the most out of your travel.

I could see a lot of my younger self in Manuel, we connected instantly and had a great time talking and discussing about Japan, movies and life in general. 
Buen viajes amigo, be good but don't forget to be bold. Suerte!

Manuel's stay was short and sweet but I'm glad I accepted his last-minute request. It was very easy for me to get comfortable with him because he's quite open and can talk about anything. He's not much of a party-goer, which is a good change for me. I can definitely recommend him as a guest to anyone.

Good luck with the rest of your trip, Manuel! I hope you get the chance to try good Filipino food somewhere. Don't forget to take your vitamins üòÇ Hasta la vista!
There is more to this guy than meets the eye. A treat for any host.
Great guy, great experience!
Since I was traveling for work I unfortunately did not meet him but he stayed at my place for a couple of days. He seemed nice, he followed all the house rules. I wish you all the very best!

Manuel stayed a few nights here. 
He is flexable and nice - we  did a lot of stuffs together like eating/sight seeing/evening walk/jamming by the riverside/helping me around the house....and he baked a Swedish bun one morning.
I would recommend him to other hosts.

All the best in your travel, Manuel.

I accepted Manuel's invitation and hosted him for 2 nights. It's a pleasure to host him.  We had great conversations and I learned a lot of things about him. I could say that Manuel is a person with skills, knowledge and wisdom. An intelligent person indeed. We had great meals together (we both love cheap yet oishi food!) And had explored central Tokyo in a day. A real hosting pleasure.

Manuel,
It's good to meet you.
Stay healthy and happy.
Safe travels amigo!
Best,
Bryan

It was extreamly fun with epecially conversation that we had with Manuel. Couldn't do much guiding to show around which makes me a bit sorry for him. Manuel is such an open guy, curious of where he visits, no planner traveler but that's the cool traveler who you want to meet up. Really enjoys to any topic which was so fun all the time.  Hope to see him again and I hope to visit his place some day.

Manuel is fun to be with once  you get to know  him better. Knowledgeable and musically inclined , he lives life with a passion. Though young  he amazes you with his forte in  photography and music knowledge among others.
Hope to meet up again one day in Spain.Safe travels my friend.

Manuel Rubio is a young man from Spain on a mission to travel the world! He is very likeable, very friendly and very easy to talk to! To top it all off, he is also a very good cook! Manuel will be the house guest you would love to have in your own home and he would definitely be most welcomed to be my guest again! Best of luck in your adventures Manuel and take care! Mi casa tu casa!
fromPublicName: S Ahmad Suhaimi S Mohd Said

text: I never expect my experience to host him turn up to be great! He is chill and calm guy, he can change to adopt the situation and independent when you are busy. I enjoy his jazz taste even those it's different from my favorite playlist. I wish we can have more time together. Hope to see you again somewhere else maybe!

I have a great time with Manuel while he's staying here in Trang. He is amazing and fun to hang out with. He asked if I know anything about his country, Spain. I know little about his country like football and bull fighting. Maybe I can find out more  when I go there. He is a nice man, friendly, kind and easy going. If I have a chance, I would like to meet him or host him again. Don't hesitate to accept him if he asking to stay at your place. You won't regret it!

My friend and I got a chance to host Manuel while i was living in Thailand. And it was amazing.
Manuel is a very creative young man, full of live and curiosity. He is a very talented photographer and took some amazing shots while he was here. 
Thank you, Manuel so much for sharing  all your interesting stories and experiences with us.  It was lovely to see you again in Chiang Mai and looking forward to see you in Spain ... or NYC‚ù§Ô∏è
We miss you and you are always welcome backüôèüèΩ

Well if that guy send you a request just accept it. 
Manuel stay at my place for 5 nights and we had very good time. We hang out in Phuket and see planctons in few beaches :) 
We had really nices conversations about everything. 
It's the type of person that sometimes stay silent for a while, and then something nice comes out, like an awesome story or a big smile. He's cool. You can feel that he's a bright guy. 
I felt comfortable with him around, just like an old friend was staying at my place.

Manuel stayed at my flat for two nights, he's a very open-minded an friendly traveller. Unfortunately I had to work early, so i couldnt show him around, but he was still up to hanging out in the evening. 
I'm sorry your travel plans didn't work out as you wanted because of Thingyan festival, but I'm sure you'll make the best out of your time! 
Enjoy
Very chill guy, he only stayed one night here but it was nice !
Manuel was here just a short time, but was very friendly and had good conversations with other guests.  He is easygoing and open to meeting new people and experiencing new things.
Manuel is multi-talented. He played guitar, leading group singing in English, French, and Spanish. He cooked so many vegan dishes and desserts. Thanks.

The photographer guy stayed with me for three night. He was very good at cooking. He cooked a tasty Kerry for dinner . He's independent traveler.
 I'm sorry, I didn't have time to take care of you and hope to see you again.
Manuel is a nice guy. this is first  time in Thailand for him but it 's good. We had a very great time with him.And i hope to see him again .

Manuel is a great person. He's friendly, polite and cool! I can tell that he is a real artist.. 
He's very good at singing and playing guitar.  I really like his photographs. And I also love his smile :)
Manuel was at my place for 3 days. We had a great dinner and good talk. We talked about many interesting places, music, cultures and how to be a great photographer :) I reccommend you to stay or host Manuel!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Tambon Nai Mueang, Chang Wat Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand

text: Manuel was a very polite and friendly guest. We enjoyed his short time with our family and wish him well on his travels!

I met Manuel when he asked me to stay with me and finally i felt as well with him that we decided to travel together for 7 days (always using couchsurfing :) ) and i have to say that it has been so nice to meet him and to stay with him 24h a day for 7 days hahaha and thats difficult to say and to find! We went to Kanchanaburi, Ayutthaya, Lopburi and Phitsanulok and we have had loads of experiences and loads of fantastic photos that Manuel took with his camera.
Manuel is so funny and you can speak with him about a lot of interesting things and learn things about photos and music. We also spend a lot of time playing the guitar and the ukelele.
If you have the opportunity you should host Manuel, you will love him! (and hate him few times hahaha but just few times :P)

He's my first spanish guest. hahaha We didn't spend more time together because of my exam. He's very nice but, he's a quiet person, I think. hahaha Thank you for your time in Lopburi. Don't hesitate to host Manuel, you will spend a special time with him.

I hosted Manuel for 2 nights in Bangkok and I was crazy about vampire moive, I woke up late night and asked him who are you hahahha:), Manuel is a very down to earth guy. You can start having great conversations with him in only a few moment after first meet, he 's very flexible, laid back and easy going person, Don't hesitate to host or meet him! Wish you all the best on your travel and hope to see you again soon ^_^
fromPublicAddressDescription: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

text: Manuel had been traveling through Morocco and was about to go home when he stayed with me. It was fun talking to him about his trip through Morocco. He gave me ideas about where I should go.

text: Manuel . who is Manuel ? who are you  man ? I found myself I hosted you but I don't remember who are you dude ? come on ? did  I got   dementia ? Oh I remembered you. You  the one I have eaten you cookies . hah .ok ok  seriously  Manuel is a gentleman and a great guy to take as a friend not only as a passenger . he is so calm and peaceful , open-minded and super friendly. with a great beard and a very long hear ( he looks like '' Into the wild Movie '' Actor  )  :-) .  easy going, happy, very positive and  ready to explore the world with passion and love  . I meet him at McDonald then we walked a little bit to the taxi station . then home .  he spent with me and my family two night . we hanged out altogether I showed him some common places at tangier and he also showed me a great library I wasn't know about in my so-called Tangier city for now   . I like it .by the way it calls  ''The Colonnes Library '' it has some great books and Romans/novels  to read . Manuel really and  DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED  If you have a chance to meet him, don't hesitate .  because will be a pleasure to know him :)   . Happy to meet you and take care of yourself man . And I hope for you a great trip road to your destinations . hit the roads because your heart was made to travel the world  .  cheers :D

Manuel is just a great guy! It was my first experience with a Spanish Couchsurfer, and a great one! We got on well and had some very good discussions, and even swapped stories of our different personal life and activities. I was expecting him to stay 3 nights, but his plan changed and only stayed 2, but I could tell he was an experienced surfer. He totally knows how to be a good guest, and he made me a very good Pasta, with a delicious sauce, and they tasted wonderful.
His presence in my house gave me a new reflection on some issues and opened my eyes on some new things. I enjoyed hosting you man! If you ever gonna come to Morocco again, Don't forget that you have a friend here!
Highly recommended and Fun to know.
Manuel is a good man i have spent a great time with him even if it was short time, i was really glad to meet you, and i hope i can see you again in Future :)
I hope to make me a visite agine

Manuel is a friendly person we spent a nice time together he is cool and brilliant, he shows me pictures that he took in places he visit, we share ideas about our cultures.
I would like that he could stay more but he have a programme i wish that he can visit us another time.
If you host him you will never regret itüòä
Manuel is a friendly person, he can play the guitar pretty well nd I'd love to see him again,  perhaps in Almeria some day ^__^
Having Manuel was a pleasure.verry organised person ,polite,left everything clean after him,Unfortunately didint too much to spend together.Ojala la proxima vez.siempre bienvenido.

Witty, friendly and relaxed guy. 

Manuel made a last-minute request because he had some business to do in Amsterdam. I wanted to spend time with my girlfriend so we did not like really "hang out". 

Still he managed to introduce me into the world of Vaporwave.
Still glad I hosted him!

Manuel turned out to be a great guest. He took care of  my cats when I was away for the weekend and they told me he had taken good care of them ;). It was also very nice to hang out together and to talk about life! I hope you'll enjoy your new travel job!

Manuel is a nice guy who I hosted along with his friend. He is fun to talk to and is happy to share his knowledge. They were filming a promo for a new foldable canoe. Had a lot of fun helping them making the video. Looking forward to seeing it on kickstarter!

I was lucky to get a guest like him because we both like the same things: to sing, dance... pretend... AND we like to have funfunfunfunfufnfun! So many inside jokes. His laugher is the best. Besides that he cooks, he plays ukulele, he knows things and he shares them. I would never have guessed that he's only 21. All in all, a person you feel absolutely comfortable with. I like him a lot :)
It was very nice to meet Manuel! He's a very interesting person and we had a few nice conversations :) buena suerte con todo!

Manuel was easy and rewarding to host and he's welcome back any time. He's a man of many talents of which folk guitar man is just one and we had a great musical goodbye party at the end. And he makes Spanish omelette.

Hey, hosts and fellow couchsurfers, let me introduce Manuel! 
If you want a really great guy as a guest, you must host him! He came as a guest, but left as a friend - I hope :) 
He is a photographer, like  me, and he is not only easy going, smart and can go totally independent in a foreign city but:
- I learned cooking from him (now I can make tortilla de patatas almost as good as his), and:
- he corrects my Spanish. I learned a lot from him. But more than that:
- he showed me stuff that I had never heard of - in MY OWN CITY! A Spanish guy who lives in Poland(!) showed me a great place, the train cemetery - only a few kms from my house.  We sneaked in and took some great photos. We had the perfect weather and perfect shots.  (see his profile)
Totally recommended :) You will be sorry, If you don't host him. 
I really hope we'll meet sooner or later - hopefully sooner!

even though i could not spent as much time as i wanted with manuel (i had to work..) i had a really nice time with him.  he is open minded and interested in a lot of things.  if you get the chance check out his pics - they are great! =) would always host him again!

Manuel stayed two nights. He is doing an round-trip through Europe. Had a great time meeting him, talking to him, hanging out. He played some songs on the guitar, and even tried to sing a german song without any german knowledge, hahah. It was cool having him around. We didn't spent lots of time unforunately, but from what I saw, he is an easy-going, cool guy, with some nice attitudes about being an artist, and go for what he is up to. Would host him again.
Manuel was very kind and inteligent. We talked about everything. He cooked to us dinner and it was very tasty. We liked his stay :)

Manuel was friendly, thoughtful and tidy guest. In case you spend time with him you can expect interesting experiences, like was out trip to abandoned chemical factory. He speaks English very well, so communication is a breeze. I definitely recommend meeting/hosting him.
Hey Manuel, we had a lot of fun together, even if for one night only! I hope you'll come back very soon in Bologna, we wait for you! :)

Manuel is really more than what he seems when you read his profile. 
I have been immediately synchronized with his irony,smart sense of humor and sympathy. 
I hope for you, people, that will read these stripes that he will be going to travel a lot in the future: so you don't lose the possibility and the pleasure to host and know that guy, if or when he will contact you, asking to be hosted!
See you Manuel

It's funny how cool it was to host Manuel, especially because I hosted him while having many things to do, plus already another couchsurfer. So I was busy, hoping that it will not be too hard to handle everything. But I found a really nice, kind and passionated guy, willing to do anything he could to help me ! That was a great experience, we talked quite long during the evening about multiple movie/music related stuff, and had walks over Stockholm with some friends. 
So even if you're busy, don't hesitate to host him, you will have great moments !
Come again whenever you want !
