text: Borja is really great and interesting person, outgoing and also very smart. It was fun to hang out with him and his friend, although I coudn't offer him full time due to other resposibilities, he made his stay at my place comfortable for everybody and I even got a little present :)  I am looking forward to meet you again, you are always welcome at my flat! :)
Easy going, fun guy with whom I had some nice Chats

I'm really glad that I was a guest of Borja and his flatmate Sergio. The funny thing is that they both have different personalities but it works, like a ying-yang, perfect balance :-) Borja is really helpful and friendly guy and we were hanging out a little, when I wasn't at the conference, going for a beer, sunbathing at the beach, talking about economics (he is a freak when it comes to this topic!) although I didn't understand him sometimes :D
I would like to meet him again!

Borja immediately accepted to host me even if we were going to be three surfers in his flat. He was extremely thoughtful, as we were many guests it was a little puzzle to figure out where I would sleep. Borja proceeded to do waaay more than what I was asking for, I only needed a roof but he ended up taking a considerable amount of his time to find and pick up an extra mat for us. He made us all feel at home and it was exactly what we needed: The weather was rainy and cloudy, us surfers felt like having a lazy day at home, relaxing and both Borja and his roommate were perfectly fine with it. As the hosts had to keep going with their things to do, they still made us feel comfortable and made sure we had everything we needed. Thank you very much guys!

I had a great time at Borja's place in Bilbao! When I arrived I was already a bit tired of the travelling I had done, but I went out with Borja and his housemates + friends, who are all amazing! I slept amazingly well in Borja's room and he took me out for a nice stroll in the park and through the old town. We had really interesting conversations for example about the role and system of education, which I liked a lot, since I'm going to do a teacher program soon! Borja really listens to what you have to say and has interesting points of views that you would definitely want to hear. 
Your stay with Borja will be comfortable, fun and interesting (also if you want to learn more about the Basque culture, Borja is the man!).

Borja introduced me to the great Basque hospitality! He picked me up from the Guggenheim, and we managed to walk around the old town, despite the rain. We went for a drink in a typical bar, and had nice conversations. I felt very much at home in his apartment, and his roommates are really cool too! Overall, I had a great time in Bilbao, thanks Borjita! You're always welcome, wherever in the world I am haha.

Carlos was a fantastic host! I was really in a bind and needed a place to stay last minute and he helped me out a ton! His apartment is really nice, and in a great, central location. I would definitely stay here again!

Thanks for everything, Carlos!

I spent 3 days in the Carlos‚Äô apartment in Madrid and he is a perfect host!
He showed me lots of amazing locations in Madrid and we spent just amazing time together walking, eating out, watching football and partying. He is really open-minded, friendly and hospitable! And a true gentleman! You can surely trust him.
I hope we will meet again!!
Carlos is one of the kindest and coolest people! His place is fantastic in a very nice area, not far from the centre. He helped me and my friend very much! Gracias Carlos!

Staying with Carlos was a great experience. He is very friendly, communicative and his house is amazingly clean. Just perfect! He was very helpful and supportive prior to my visit to Madrid and the location is super easy to find. We had a great time watching our favourite Eurovision performances and the sunset from the park nearby was spectacular. Something I will remember for a long time. I felt very welcome and I hope we'll meet again. :) Muchas gracias y hasta luego!

Staying with Carlos was really great! He made me feel like home in  his  flat. He's really reliable and interesting person to be with. I really enjoyed the time spent with him. Best wishes :) hoping to see you again :) Good luck in the new projects
Carlos is a really friendly guy. He was so generous and was good company. But he also let me do things on my own schedule. Good host!
Carlos is a definitely a nice host! Very welcoming, friendly and hospitable! We spent a  day together and we did have lots of fun! Thanks for the dinner buddy! Highly recommended!

This was my first trip to Europe and my first experience in Couchsurfing. Carlos made of this experience the best one. All time Carlos went very kindless, thoughtful, careful, and generous with me. I think I was lucky to find him, but a little more lucky when he accepted my request. It has a very nice flat, comfortable, and clean with a tasteful decoration, located in a very strategic area of the city from where it is very easy to reach the downtown, walking a few meters to the station of Laguna. Carlos not only gave me a space in his flat, he also gave me his time to share very fun conversations. He is a very smart guy with whom you can learn a lot about spain culture, reflective themes, and also laugh a lot about other topics while you drink a good glass of wine or while you eat a delicious salmon that he prepared me himself. He allowed me to have the keys to his house during the first two days while I was visiting the beautiful city of Madrid. The last night Carlos accompanied me to walk through the magical Gran Via, the Plaza Mayor and the Mercado de San Miguel, while he told me and explained the history of these places, where we also shared a cold beers and a delicious dinner.
With him I could be who I am and learn a lot. Carlos has a many qualities who make him a great human being. I arrived to Madrid to know this magical city but today I have a great friend,  a brother. I will never have enough words to say thank you for this great experience. I just hope to hang out with him again in the future. I'm wait for you in Colombia, my brother.
With all this needless to say I would stay at his house again, and I recommend him as a great host of Couchsurfing.
Carlos is a great guy, I had a short but very nice stay at his place! Hasta luego Carlos !

If you're ok with being naked around the apartment then Carlos is a great host. Not that he wouldn't be otherwise but him being a nudist it makes more sense if everyone adapts. We didn't spend much time with him apart from one afternoon in the city and then breakfast but he made a sympathetic and relaxed impression on us.

Staying with Carlos was a great expirience. He gave us a warm welcome, showed us around the city. He had a great deal of knowledge about Madrid and wanted to share it with us. I felt good at his place, he also shared his food with us. I recommend staying with him, i had a really good time :D

I really enjoyed my stay in Madrid. I think that Carlos was friendly and helpful. He explained us what is best to see in Madrid and gave all the directions. He also offered a lot of delicious food, which was unexpected. Moreover, he was very friendly and wanted to get to know us.

Staying with Joana was great, super enthusiastic and fun person to be with!! Joana took me around Madrid and lives in the coolest neighborhood of the city, close to many bars and nightlife. 
Plus Joana is a great cook and surely knows good places to eat.
Really enjoyed my stay here and hope to come visit again soon! 
Thanks for the good times and see you again soon in Madrid or whenever you‚Äôre coming to Germany ‚úåüèΩ

Hey Jesus,

sorry that I didnt have the time to leave you a reference since march, I had so many other things in my mind that I found it hard to think back to my time in madrid.

I surfed with Jesus for a whole Weekend to participate in a Magic: The Gathering (a famous card game) tournament. Since I lost on the first day, I had the time to get to know Jesus a little more (I planned to play the whole weekend). We ate Tapas in two of his favourite places in Madrid, and I much enjoyed it. It was a little hard at first to communicate, since there was a little language barrier, but soon we understood each other. The chemisty was just right. After a few beers, we were talking about deep topics, like family and the very personal view on the own future.

I very much recommend you to stay with jesus. He showed me an awesome angry birds costume he bought from the internet, i suppose you may see it anywhere dancing around soon.

Thank you for all,
Roman

text:

Mariana and her twin sister are awesome!!! 
They received me with a delicious mexican dinner, chilaquiles. Your home was clean and I slept in a private room with a very comfortable bed. They showed me some typical places of Madrid. I'm very grateful with both of them and delighted to have new friends.

Mariana and Julieta were great hosts. They welcomed me to their flat, where I even got my own room and could feel like home. Mariana y su hermana (e incluso su amiga Lis) son muy buena onda y me hicieron sentir en casa desde el primer momento. El ambiente era siempre alegre y lleno de risas. Bebemos, jugamos y hablamos de muchas cosas. Tambi√©n me llevaron a pasear y me mostraron al final de mi viaje lugares a los que no ir√≠a si no me llevaran all√≠.

Mariana and her sister (and even her friend Lis) are super easygoing and they make me feel myself in home from the first moment. The ambience was always cheerful and full of laughter. We drunk, we played, and we talked about many things. The girls also took me for a walk and showed me at the end of my trip places I would not go if they didn't take me there.
I was very comfortable in the house, too. On the mattress in the living room and in the bedroom (yes, I got an upgrade) they always gave me the maximum possible privacy.
The best part of Madrid undoubtedly was to be able to live with these two great souls.

I just felt like at home. They gave me some advices, recommended nice places, hanged out with me, although they were really busy and even sick! For me that is what couchsurfing is all about! I feel in love with Madrid and I'd love to meet my lovely couchsurfers again :) Feel invited to visit me anywhere! :)

The stay at Matteo was perfect. He and his flatmate Josh are really nice, easy going and fun people. We enjoyed staying at their place and hanging out with them a lot. 
Thank you Josh & Matteo! :)
Matteo was a cool host. We had our own room which was clean. He was really friendly and his English was on a high level. We had a great time in Madrid! üòä

I had been staying in Bergamo for few hours at night between my flights, without sleeping.. Matteo agreed to meet me at night and made my time in cold Bergamo very cozy. I appreciated a lot his efforts not to fall asleep and not to let me to do so. Staying with him was more than nice - evening full of smiles and good emotions, awesome atmosphere!!! Hope to see Matteo more than one more time, in Italy, Malta or somewhere else!

text: Manuel is so great! He‚Äôs the best person to hang out with, he knows the best bars and restaurants in Madrid! He‚Äôs super cool and I plan  to visit him again!
Thanks for offering tho, next time!

Manuel is such a sweet person. He helped me out last minute when I needed somewhere to stay. He gave me his own bed and he slept out in the loving room. A true gentleman. Not a had view to have in the morning also. Thank you for everything Manuel

fromPublicAddressDescription: La Plata, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

text: I was enjoying staying with Carlos. He showed me around.  I knew how Spanish people used to live, resting in bars and cafes, talking to each other.  This leisure is the integral, main part of their lifestyle.  I had a deep experience and got new feelings. Thanks a lot for this, Carlos.

I had a wonderfull time with Carlos, he showed me around the best restaurants and bars in town and we went dancing. We had great conversations about pretty much everything, laughed a lot. He was really caring especialy when i mysterically bumped my head on a nightout and looked like a unicorn. Thanks for everything Carlos hope to meet again one day!

I could leave negative review, just for a change :-) But there is nothing negative about my experience! 

Carlos is a live version of what a CS experience should look like. It is not about just finding a free place to stay but about getting to know cool people aroun the world :-) outstanding hospitality and interesting personality  - that can well be said about this guy! 

He was very kind to host me and to introduce me to restaurants and bars not marked on a standard touristic map. We shared life and culture talks, wandered around Madrid and overall had a very cool time.  

I do hope to pay back with my hospitality in Moscow!

Carlos in very interesting, open-minded and nice person.
It was a pity, that we hadn‚Äôt enough of time to know each other, because it was the beginning of the week and he had a lot of work. But it was very interesting to speak with him, and he is very kind!

Thank You, Carlos!))

Stayed at Carlos's appartment with friend. It was our first experience on couchsurfing so we were nervous and anxious a little bit. But from the first moment we felt at home. Carlos showed us HIS Madrid. We would never find these places by ourselves. A lot of fun and moments to remember!!! It was really amazing time. I love Madrid! Carlos thank you so much! See you in Minsk ;)

Carlos made me feel like at home, showed me around. Cooked for me and even did some shopping with me. Poor guy, lol! He was my first host experience. His flat is right in the city center, you reach most of the nice places by walking. He lives in the 4th floor with no lift, so all the staurs will tone your legs haha. Gracias por todo CDBT! 

Camilla Maria

If you want to fall in love with Madrid you should stay with Carlos. I found out with Carlos authentic Madrid places, foods and drinks and now Im a great fan of it.  Madrid became my favorite city I have been to. Carlos is very easygoing and flexible person. Hope my love of walking didnt make you very tired, Carlos :)
Wow, üëçüèªüëçüëç, he is really good)))

Cepillo host me for two nights. He is very nice person, friendly, always ready to help. He helped also for my two friends and invited them to his flat before their early flight. We had unforgettable time in Madrid. We visited amazing Mexican restaurant, we tried most tasty tapas ever and spent great time in different typical bars. Although it was Monday and Carlos had work next day, he shared his time with us. Thank you for bicycle tour, for interesting conversation, dancing, movie, comfortable couch and understanding my humor :D I really felt in love with Madrid. Hope to see you soon.

Carlos is such an amazing person! He's eager to show you and teach you the Spanish ways, to educate you about the Mexican ways and get you fall in love with food! 
I had a brilliant stay with him, he's so easy going and laid back it was a pleasure spending every second with him. 
He showed me around, we rode bikes, went to pubs and night clubs together, watched stand up comedians and just had brill time!   
Thank you, Carlos!!!
I stayed with Carlos during my trip in Madrid...he is very nice and helpful person...he hosted me even if he had some troubles...thanks a lot :)

Carlos hosted me and my friend in Madrid 4 nights. It was perfect time...besides the weather;)) I can describe him only in superlatives! He is a very positive, friendly, helpful, inteligent man who will be taking care of you really seriously. He showed us tipical spanish way of life full of positive moments :) We spend lots of time together, having fun but even with some crisi Carlos can give you an advice, support and help you. During our stay he showed us nice places in Madrid, we tried delicious food, I could practise with him spanish. We were discussing lots of problems and issues during our trip -  in Toledo. Furthermore, he let us to sleep in his bedroom which was really very kind. I can strongly recommend this host because he is really trustful and so friendly person that you need to meet for sure during your stay in Madrid.
Carlos thank you once again and hope to see you in Poland soon or in Spain!! :))

text: Carlos hosted me and my friend for five days in Madrid and it was great experience! He was very friendly and kind always ready to help and he definitely made us feel like at home!  :)

Carlos has been a fantastic host and rescued me from another nightmare experience I had on my arrival in Madrid staying with someone else. He made me feel at home, we went out together and had a great time. Thank you Carlos!

True couchsurfer host here. Carlos is everything you wish when looking for a host. He's very kind and fun. I had such a great time with him! He's really into music and movies and he travels a lot! In his home I felt at home and we had such a good time together! Thanks for everything!

It was great to stay with Carlos. He showed me the best places in Madrid, also the best bars and restaurants. I enjoyed our conversations and we had a lot of fun together. Now I know a lot more about the mexican culture, thanks for this. I felt very comfortable in his flat although it was very hot. It was a pleasure to meet Carlos and I hope we will meet again one day! :-)

Even though we had some technical problems at the beginning, i'm glad that we could meet :) Best person to guide you around in Madrid in the evening/night, explaining all the little things one should knoe when travelling there. Also nice talking to him about different topics. And of course, sharing a Pacharan with :-) Thank you for hosting me!

Carlos hosted me one night in Madrid and I was overwhelmed by his friendlyness and trust. I came in the very early morning and he immediately gave me the keys and made me feel comfortable in his place. Carlos is very sympathic and funny and in the same time a generous; nice and respectful host. Thank you Carlos and see you again!

I really enjoyed time with Carlos, he is an amazing host, willing to help you and go with you where you would like to go..kind and a good friend.. =P he showed me amazing dish - fruit with chilli, thank you Carlos.

Carlos is the perfect host for a calm Sunday night out. Friendly, smart and open to communication with everyone, and not least of all - patient :) He took us to a local tapas restaurant and the best chillout bar I've even seen. Hope we will meet in Sofia very soon! :)

Carlos is an amazing host and we had a wonderful time. He showed me his city which he knows very well by bike and walk. He showed me his favorite places, restaurants, bars and the night life in Madrid. Moreover we went to various exhibitions and I got a good impression about art and architecture in Madrid. The tapas, food and drinks you can get is so delicious and good. I'm glad we had this in common and enjoyed either going out. At the end of my trip Carlos teached me cooking a mexican dish what was very tasty. It's hard to describe what an amazing time I had and I really can recommend everyone to get in touch with him. It was a very good experience and I'm going to come back for sure. Carlos thanks for everything and being such a good host.

text:

text:
Fabrizio was super kind with me!
He gave me the possibility to move in his house as it was mine and brought me around Madrid, making me knowing also his amazing group of friends. 
He has many story to tell you and he's a great chatting-mate :)
Totally recommended if you want to enjoy a non-common and even less turistic staying in Madrid :)
Thank you Fabri, a big hug, see you around the world <3

F is definitely the guy you want to meet on your travel. Super welcoming and caring! Thanks! He traveled the world and has amazing pictures and stories to tell. See you spontaneously in Berlin with dancing feet :) ! Ciao, ciao!

I just stayed one night with Fabrizio but he was a really good host. He is easy going, really friendly and thoughtful. And he is a good cook as well! We had some beers and really interesting talks about his and my traveling and about everything really. So thanks for an amazing last night in Madrid (and sorry that I was too tired to go partying haha)! üòä

Fabrizio hosted me for 1 night and is was amazing ! Travel stories, fantastic fotos, italian rock....he shared a lof interresting things with me! Thank you so much Fabriziano, enjoy Peru !

Fabrizio was a great host! I only spend one day in Madrid but he gave me all the indications to discover it and he took me to this really cool street party with his friends. He also gave me valuable information for my trip to Italy. 
He knows the city very well, he's fun, relaxed and you can talk to him about evreything! You can talk to him about everything while sharing drinks :).
I hope to see you again when you visit the south!

Organizing trip to Madrid was a bit strange thing but also really funny. Fabrizio was hosting me for couple of days and he was very kind. He told me about his trips and places he liked the most, we were talking about traditional food and he is great cook, I must admit. We went out with his italian friends, they also showed me the part of the city where is party 24/7. 
I hope to hear more interesting stories after your trip in Per√π, good luck!

It was a long way until I finally got to know Fabrizio.. but I'm happy that we made it! I spent only two days with him in Torino and this clearly wasn't enought. Fabrizio is a very nice person and he picked me up right at the trainstation. He showed me round the city and we talked all day about traveling. Thanks Fabrizio for hosting me.

text: Eduardo was a perfect guest! He is very polite, good-hearted and broadminded.  He was neat and respectful with my house. We had really great time talking about his life and experience, which are admirable. Recommend!

Eduardo was a nice guest, polite and respectable to my house and to my free space. He is a nice company! It was interesting to talk with him about his life in Spain and his travels. He has impressively large life experience, I learnt a lot from his stories!! Highly recommend him both as a guest and a friend!!

Edu and his friend Javi are very inspirational guys,with their way of life and ideas for their business.Their stay at my place was short,but very spontaneous,easygoing and above all with lot of fun.Thank u for the nice evening (eventhough i wasn`t such a great party host after midnight:))))))))

Eduardo was my first surfer and I can say that I had very good experience. Spending two days together I have to say that he is very nice and interesting guy. He is full of interesting stories. We also went out (turbo folk and latino parties :D), we saw the places in Novi Sad and we spent very nice time together. He is also very good cook, since he cooked dinner for my and my roommate :) I would recommend Edu and I hope we will meet again.

such a cool host üòç my friend and I spent the evening with Eduardo and his friends, he made such a wonderful dinner for all of us. we also visited Toledo together. great guide with many amazing stories #pececito ‚ù§
Eduardo, see you soon in Porto! it was really great to meet you!

My experience with Eduardo has been simply amazing!!! Eduardo is a lovely person, very fun, positive, flexible and attentive, and I felt comfortable as if we have been knowing each other since always. He accepted to host me with a very short notice, and he was kind at the point of dropping me to the airport the morning after. His stories on travels and adventures are the best ever - really fun and interesting :) He is an inspiring and pleasant person, and I warmly recommend him! 

Good luck for next trips and adventures Edu! Really hope to cross you again soon, and you are always welcome wherever I am! :)

text:
Eduardo is a really welcoming guy. He invite us to go out with his friends the day we met. He is really friendly and it is so cool to speak with him. 
He gave us some advices and made our experience in Madrid unforgettable! 
I hope we can met again soon.

I spent two nights at Edu's place! He and his friends were very very "amable" üòò We had lot of fun, hanging out and sharing moments. 
Edu thought me the best part of the city to visit and was open to host a friend of mine for one night at last minute. 
I ate very topical food in his open bar: the best is definitely the tortilla con jamon y queso.
His house his big and comfortable, with a lot of place to stay.
I really would like to meet you and your friends again, feel free to come to Italy üòä
Muchas gracias de todo
Asta luego!!!

Eduardo's home is very beautiful and no worries there is enough space there!! Edu showed us the city and the best restaurants. He is funny, open minded and intelligent. Aks him for the story with pescacito and you will understand what I meanüòä thank you Edu for being so cool even I tried to burn your kitchen üòïüòÇ hope to see u soon again. Cheers

Edu is the best host you can ever imagine. He is so kind and has a great sense of humor. He makes you feel like home at the very first moment. His house is amazing and we had a nice trip to Segovia with his friends. He told us a many facts about Spain and showed us the most important sights. We had great parties at his bar and his house and me and my friends had the BEST time in Madrid and one of the best nights ever and we were really sad to leave. If you ever want to go to Madrid you should definitely meet this amazing soul. He's always open for a nice chat and you can laugh with him 24/7!! Hope to see you again soon and we are waiting for you to visit us in the Netherlands ;) 
All the best to you and we will miss you!!!

I had a great time in Madrid with Eduardo!
He is a gentleman who will always help you and support with anything you need but also will take you to parties and show you the beauty of his city. He is an experienced traveller and has sooo many interesting stories to share! 
I really like his sense of humour and admire how brave and strong he is. He started his career from scratch and succeeded because of his brilliant ideas and hard-working. Even while being a boss he is a friend for his co-workers and a person with who they can share any problem. His strategies are modern and innovative. He is a very inspirational person, indeed.
We got on well very quickly and I hope we will stay friends for longer!

It was my first time with Couchsurfing and I was a bit nervous how it will be. But thanks to Eduardo my friends and me feel very comfortable!!!  He was very flexible and we planned it just one day before to sleep there and go out together.  We had a really good night, and Eduardo is just a very friendly and open person! üòå  - and thank you a lot for the good dinner!! 
For everyone who is searching someone for Couchsurfing, go to Eduardo!

We had no idea what to expect when we planned our trip to Madrid through couchsurfing (we didn¬¥t have that much experience with it). The truth is Edu is an amazing host and that is something that we could tell basically since the minute our plane touched down in Madrid. Because despite the fact that Eduardo was travelling on that day himself he arranged that his friends picked us up at the airport and helped us with everything (thanks for that guys!! üôÇ ). Eduardo went far beyond in making sure we were comfortable, he was very attentive (he even made us paella one day ). We honestly felt like we are at home.  To be honest we aren¬¥t really sure how we were able to see all sights we planned beforehand  because if you ever plan a trip to Madrid you should get ready for ‚Äûslightly‚Äú different time management üòÄ üòÄ üòÄ ( in Madrid you sleep from 8 in the morning through the day till around 4 in the afternoon ‚Äì on the WEEKENDS of course üòÄ :D) so basicaly Madrid lives at night üòâ 
Anyway, our five days in Madrid were definitely great days. We had a loads of fun doing everything from sightseeing, trip to Toledo that Edu took us on or the nighlife. We are glad that we met awesome new people and thank you so much for making us feel welcomed there üôÇ  Hope to see you again soon üôÇ
Alvaro is very friendly and nice guy. We had some talk and I gave him some travel advice in China.hope to meet you  guys somewhere in the future. Wish you a great journey in Shanghai
Alvaro is very friendly guy :) I had a good time with him:)

I have no words to describe Antonio!! I didn‚Äôt stay in his house cause I had already booked the hostel but we have met some days in Madrid and he was awesome! extremely helpful and friendly, showed me several beautiful points of the city on his motorcycle and we had a lot of fun! Antonio is someone with who you can have good conversations about everything, besides being a very kind guy. Well, you know you have a friend here! And I really hope to see you again in some place of the world! Muchas gracias por haber hecho mi viaje a madrid a√∫n m√°s linda y especial! I‚Äôll miss you!

Antonio host me and my friend Nathalia for 2 nigths, and we had a great time in Madri! He and his housemate Tony were really nice and kind with us, they received us w/ empanadas and jamon, very spanish style! Also we had fun and "bailamos mucho" on a party at center of Madri! We will miss Lea a lot, the cutest dog a ever see :) !!! Hope see you again guys, maybe in Brasil next time!

text: Carlos was a wonderful host: kind, funny, polite, flexible and helpful. It was a pleasure to meet him and have interesting and deep talks with him. For sure I recommend him as a host!

Carlos is a good guy...you can't  get bored with him;)
We keep in touch!
Carlos spent only one day at my place, but I (and my family) can definitely say that he's a very friendly, easygoing and smart person. Viva la m√∫sica y el ratonicito! ;) See you!
Carlos was a great guest! He‚Äôs a cleaver, outgoing and interesting person! It was a pleasure to have him!

Desear√≠a que Carlos se hubiera quedado m√°s que una noche nada m√°s. Al menos me pone contenta saber que se queda en mi ciudad por unos meses y que nos vamos a volver a ver.  Fue chistoso porque se qued√≥ una sola noche, pero apenas dormimos! Nos trasnochamos porque salimos a tomar unas cervezas con otros dos amigos de CS, luego vimos el carnaval por las calles del barrio, volvimos a la casa, a degustar salsas picantes, beber un poco m√°s, y hablar hasta que sali√≥ el sol. 
Tambi√©n fue super que Carlos es un excelente guitarrista y tiene muy buena voz, asique si tienes una guitarra en tu casa, ya sabes que √©l va a traer m√∫sica a tu sala. Gracias Carlos! Ha sido un placer conocerte!

I wish Carlos had stayed longer than just one night. At least I'm happy to know that he's sticking around in my city for a few more months and we'll meet again. It was funny that he stayed for only one night but we barely slept! We stayed up all night because we went out for some beers with two other friends from CS, we went to check out carnaval on the neighborhood streets, we came back to the house to try hot sauces, drink some more, and we talked until the sun came out.
It was also really nice that Carlos is an excellent guitar player and has a wonderful voice, so if you have a guitar at home, you now know that he'll bring music to your living room. Thanks Carlos! It was lovely meeting you.
Haha, Carlos is a great guy. He played jazz and soul music in the bad piano I have at home... It was impossible, but he got! Is a great singer and a good friend. See you soon!

text:
It was such a pleasure having Carmen and her two friends stay with me for three nights.  A lovely free-spirited individual with the most beautiful soul. Great company and lots of fun. A pleasure to show her around as she loves everything "Me encanta!! <3 ". 
Always have a place in my home for you!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

text: Marta is really friendly and a great person all around. In the short time we spent together, I was very happy to have met her as a traveler from Spain. Will definitely recommend her as a guest!

Dan and Noelia are both adorable and they are always welcome back to my home! They were quiet and clean guests and had a lot of understanding for my busy schedule! They shared their interesting stories from a long travel in south east Asia and we spent together a lovely evening  eating at a Greek taverna! Dan and Noelia wish you a smooth settling back home and hope I will meet you someday in Madrid! :-)

Dan and Noela are such a lovely couple. They are kind and very curious about Philippines and how it is similar to the culture, food, and language of Spain. I am really glad to host them. All the best!
They are nice peoples with lot of experience of travelling ...

I am glad I got a chance to meet the lovely couple.
It has been a truly enriching experience to meet them, even though for the shortest time possible.
It was my bad that my house was not ready for accommodation but I did spend a lot of time for a day actually making me feel hosting someone dear.

They both are knowledgeable and have good adaptability factor in them. I would urge everyone reading my reference to host them as It will surely bring good vibes to the house. Thanks Danny for writing to me and taking an effort to be there around..
Dan and his partner were real nice, it was real fun to have them around. They both are real good listener, I know because I talk a lot. They are one travellers you should host.
Very nice couple, so kind and gentle. Have a good trip an another countries, welcome to Kyrgyzstan again, if you want)))

Interesting and very kind person. Indeed they are couples who are travelling around the world. 
I wish them long lasting and never ending tight relationship. I will definitely feel happy to see them happy. 
Any time I will host them again and again. 
Good Luck Guys
Nice to meet with Daniel and Noelia. During their stay, they become member of our family. It was pleasure to meet and host them.

Dan was very good person, he has good character with people. We together with his wife visited khiva and urgench city. he is smart person. If I had a chance to host him, I would offer him to my home. According to his wife. she is very funny, and sociable with people. THANKS for them to become with me at my home.

Dan and Noe are great people and an amazing couple, even in their argument you can see love:) they are respectful, open-minded, and beautiful people(refering Rihanna's song "beautiful people").  Unfortunately I didn't have much time with them because of my work but we had great and wonderful conversations. Almost all tourists I have seen so far are in rush for somewhere or something, and I think what's the point of travelling if you are in rush, however Dan and Noe have the right spirit, right attitude, they are relaxed, they can enjoy the moment, live the life, take risks like getting a sabattical from their jobs for like 10 months after which they may not have anymore :) i would definetly host them again

Dan and Noe are very neat, thankful and interesting guys. It's very funny and comfortable to be with them.
Dan has made a big progress in reading Russian words while being in Almaty. He is so open-minded! 
Guys also played with our daughter in evenings, so she was very upset because they have to leave.
We were glad to meet the guys in Almaty and hope to see them in Spain already!

Dan and Noelia are very nice couple, easygoing and friendly. they stayed with us for three nights. we share dinner and interesting talks, they tell us a lot about Spain and I really want to visit such a wonderful country again.  One evening they prepared torliliya very very tasty Spanish meal. We would be happy to host them again in the future.
PS I wish you all the best  further in your  trip and life. hope you will enjoy Kolsay and Koyandi trip and manage to make hiking in Almaty.

Dan and his girlfriend Noelia were great fun when they surfed at my place in Astana. They were also fantastic hosts...in my own flat! They were lovely to chat to, happy to try some interesting kazakh foods and were incredibly helpful around my flat - cooking for people at a party I had and meeting new couchsurfers when I was out! Anyone would be very fortunate to host them.

Dani is a fantastic person, cheerful and interesting with plenty of adventures to talk about, always up to anything fun, new, very open to people and who enjoys every second of life with a perfect balanced mind, meeting up with him and his girlfriend must be in your Couchsurfers-to-do-list!!

ABSOLUTELY RECOMMENDABLE
Staying with Dan was just great!
Noe and he made us (my girlfriend and me) feel at home or even better :)
Really attentive and helpful, we enjoyed walking around the city and 100 montaditos (aprox).. :p
I'd totally recommend to host/be hosted by them.
Looking forward to receiving you in Buenos Aires!!!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Colegiales, Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires City, Argentina

text: Dan was a lifesaver! I had another host that was unresponsive upon my arrival and I didn't have his address but Dan accepted me with hours of my arrival and not only that but him and his girlfriend were super friendly/fun to have a drink with. Dan also helped me navigate the transport easily. Fue un buen placer y no puedo esperar a reunir un otro tiemp :) Mucas gracias por todos!!!

Alberto is friendly, kind and helpful host! He made me feel welcome and I also enjoyed hearing about his life and travels. We had good conversation and great meals together. His place is super nice and clean. Thank you for offering me a private room, it was kind!

Alberto was simply the best host I could dream of for my first couchsurfing experience ! He agreed to host me for two nights but I end up staying four nights in total. He came to pick me up at the metro station at 2am (!!!) which is already incredible, and during all my stay he has been incredibly kind and thoughtful to make sure that I was having the best time in Madrid. He gave me tips to visit Madrid on my own, took me on a bicycle ride at sunset, and we spent a very surprising espagnol/chinese evening together ! 
Besides, his place is very nice and easily reachable from the center by metro - and I had my own room and a key. And he speaks French and English, but he tried to teach me a bit of Spanish - now I know perfectly how to use the word "cojones" üòÑ.
All in all, he is a very friendly and funny guy, genuinely generous,  with good conversation. Highly recommended! Muchas gracias por todo Alberto !
Alberto went out of his way to help me when I got to Madrid. Showed me cheap and fun places to go, we went for a bike ride, had a few beers. Great guy and would highly recommend staying with him!

text:
I only stay at Daniel ‚Äòs place for one night , but it became the great day I had in Madrid.
He gave me the clear information about the transportation and he knows Madrid pretty well, we hangout in the evening, walked in different areas, he showed me the real Madrid life.
He is intelligent, funny and easy to have conversations with anything, I enjoy my day with him so much !!
Thank u Daniel :)
fromPublicAddressDescription: Datong District, Taipei City, Taiwan, Province of China

text: It was really cool to spend time with Daniel in Salvador. He has a free spirit and initiated me to the "intuitions". Actually he changed my trip, as then I went hiking in Chapada with no guide, just chosing path on my intuitions, and it worked. Daniel has a lot of energy and power of mind to share, definitely worth meeting and you always have a good time with him. I hope to see him back in Europe (thank you Ryanair) or better to travel further in South America with this free mind!! Thanks for the shared moments.

text:
I spent the last days of my journey with Erika and it couldn't get any better. She is the best CS host: amazingly thoughtful, so hospitable and with a huge sense of humor. 
I loved our late night conversations with her awesome flatmate Camila. I learnt so much and laughed so hard with them I just wished I could stay longer.
Thank you very much for showing me around, las gorditas, los tacos, las arepas and the beers. It was amazing!
Looking forward to meet again, hopefully in Mexico.
fromPublicAddressDescription: San Borja, Municipalidad Metropolitana de Lima, Peru

text:
Erika was a great host! I wish I could stay more than just 1 night. We walked the beautiful streets of Madrid at night, had some great food and beer and talked a lot! She's very clever, nice and friendly! There's no chance to stay silent with her! I love her sense of humour and the way she thinks about life. Great philosophy! 
Thank you Erika, to be such a lovely companion :) <3

Erika was so kind and good with me that I get the feeling my words won‚Äôt be enough to explain it well.

She‚Äôs thoughtful and always willing to provide you with a nice and comfortable experience. Every single minute of my stay I notice how she was genuinely trying to make it better, recommended me the musts, the do-ables, the maybes and the nos of Madrid.
Also explained how to use the subway system which had been confusing for me at first.

She even made space in her tight agenda to take me out to know some places in Madrid.

I am absolutely sure that Erika‚Äôs escence constitutes what Couchsurfing is all about, good vibes, collaboration, learning, discovering and helping one to each other.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico

text: She always try to be with us and take me and other friends to know the best places in Madrid, she s also funny and always is carrrying about yourself and to be confortable with all, and the best part, she is MEXICAN!!

Erika is kind, lovely and have a huge heart. Thanks to her me and my girlfriend spent a amazing time in Madrid. I‚Äôll never forget her help and will wait her in my country where she will always have a place waiting for her. Thanks a lot Erika!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

text:
Sofia is a really nice and interesting person with a lot of interesting stories to tell and experiences to share. The house is clean really nice and well-finished, reflect in toto her personality. I wish i will meet her again in Madrid, Porto or another country of the world!! 

Good luck for everything Sofia, you deserve it ;)

Nadja was a great host! Kind, courteous, clean, and considerate, she opened her home to me without reservation. After showing me her neighborhood and teaching me the ins and outs of Madrid, she gave me her keys and encouraged me to explore the city. She also showed me events in Madrid, including a club crawl we attended together! Also, her apartment is close to the metro to give you easy access to the city. If given the chance, stay with Nadja for a great starting point for your adventures in Madrid üòä

I just stayed one night but it was a nice stay!
Nadja picked me up at the metro station and helped me with all my questions. She also was very flexible cuz my request was kind of spontaneous!

Generally speaking , Fernando is a good guy.
Personally,I will stay with him again.

But some reminders for surfers:

First of all He doesn‚Äôt speak English ,  we use google translate for very simple conversations, and after that , we always sit in silence but it‚Äôs totally fine .if you speaks Spanish I think you will get a better conversation with him .

Secondly,the room will be always dark because he is frugal, doesn‚Äôt wanna use any  unnecessary  electricity such as light üí°. he didn‚Äôt say anything about the usage of water but I feel like using water cautiously.

Last but not least , he sleep at the sofa and offers the room for guest which is very generous . I appreciated it , I really am . But for girls surfers,  Just imagine a typical guy living alone , how the room will look like . It  might not clean enough for girls.(or maybe for guys too)

Anyway, Fernando is a good guy, you should stay with him if you are really on  budget trips and the location is great.

Thank you Fernando .

Flavio surfed my couch for a night together with his friends Luis and Piero. He's simply a great guy. He's genuinely friendly, knows how to party and know how to the most original pictures possible at the Brussels tourist spots :)
I hope we'll meet again.

Gracias y Bienvenidos a Finlandia!

text:
Flavio and Raul hosted us in their cozy little home for 3 nights. They showed us the night life of Madrid and the everyday musician life in the retiro park. With them we "survived" ;) our first oysters. If you wanna mix your experience of Madrid with Latin-America, then don't miss out to stay with Flavio and Raul!
Thanks for everything. Melly and Anja

Flavio saved us of spending night on a street in Madrid! Thanks again:D It was really fun to stay in their house, you can chill out there.O! Flavio sang all the time, it was good to hear:) We also have opportunity to taste vodka from Peru (believe me- it's soft:) we hope to see him again!

Great person, very nice and friendly! He was working but in his bit spare time show me a bit of the city and explain me what to visit and get to the places. And a great night talking and drinking orujo (I expect to have written it right because I wasn't able to pronounce it). Definitely we'll meet again someday in Warsaw or Madrid.

Rafal and his wife stayed one night at my place. Even though we didn't have a lot of time together, we had a very nice conversation about many interesting things. They are a lovely couple and it was very nice having them here! I would recommend anyone to host and spend time with them!

It was my first experience in CS, and it couldn't be better, it was a pleasure to host Rafal and Luisa! Both are very kind, friendly and smart. We had interesting conversations, we did some yoga (Luisa is very good in that) and Rafal showed me some aikido moves. We had a good and relaxing time together. And thanks for delicious pasta! Wish you all the best!
Rafal was a thoughtful guest that brought with him chocolates and a thesaurus :) he was open to hanging out and sharing stories. Would definitely host again. See you soon mate :)

I hosted Luisa and Rafal for two nights, they‚Äôre wery kind and friendly, Luisa is a really good  cook and Rafal is an excellent teacher, he gave me a lot of memory tips. I had a very  good time with them, I hope we‚Äôll see again in Madrid, Granada o Mallorca again! Hugs

text:
Rafal and Kuba spent one night at my home. They are funny and we connected directly. :)
Rafal seems to be a person who is interested in everything and tries out anything. That's why he has so many skills (languages, playing the guitar, martial arts,...) and knowledge on almost anything you ask him (history, books, geography,...). text: Rafal responded to my open CS request to CS in Madrid for two nights. Upon arrival he stated that I couldn't sleep on the couch because- he had an extremely shy flatmate who wouldn't cope with me on the couch. So it was either share his bed or the floor- I said I'd be OK on the floor. Rafal then told me another cser would be coming- they had a mutual friend, we'd make it work- she'd be OK with sleeping in the bed with him. Showing me numerous massage certificates he offered me a massage and questioned whether I had a boyfriend. He offered me wine and preceded to get drunk and say things like "instead of watching the show, I keep watching you". I rebuffed it all. Thinking he was ultimately harmless- I asked to stay a third night which he said should be OK. The 2nd night the other cser arrived- he said that he wouldn't be able to host me another night. Suddenly, he also said I was free to sleep on the couch. Bewildered at the inconsistencies, I took my things to the living room to pack and stayed on the couch. I woke approx 5:30 in the morning to him shaking me awake- saying I had to come back to the room. Following him groggily, he told me the other cser was sleeping on the floor and that he was sorry, I had to share the bed with him. I said I'd rather sit on the floor until the morning. The other cser, feeling bad that she had taken the floor - said she'd get back into the bed with him. In the morning- we both left to go to a hostel.

Rafal is amazingly interesting, curious, friendly and energetic person. He met me at the train station, helped with my luggage and told many nice things. We cooked dinner together, which was fun, talked a lot and shared experience in almost everything! Food, travel, books, sports...We have much in common so I think it is indeed a beginning of a long lasting friendship :)

text: I know this person for quite a long time and he has a special place in my life. Although we didn't meet so much but I am absolutely sure that he is a wonderful person and a good friend. He is honest, kind, helpful and caring. And I am glad that we are friends.
inverseReference:
{'id': '10777374', 'text': 'I spent two amazing days with Faora!!

We visited the main highlights of Madrid, took wonderful pictures, ate nice tapas, drank sangr√≠a...

text: Thanks a lot for everything Alberto! It was really great to explore the city with him. He knows all about the history! Also he has been really thoughtful! I would recommend him ofc :) See you in Istanbul maybeee :)

Unfortunately, I could only spend one night on Alberto's couch (which was comfortably enough ;) ). He's a great guy - he made me feel very welcome, his late-night city tour was pretty cool and his researching-blablacar-meeting-points-on-google-maps-skills are incomparable. 
Only con: the Mojito that he's going to make you drink in his favorite bar is more of a mint daiquiri :P Nevertheless does it taste good and refreshing and the bar is definitely worth a visit.
Thanks a lot, Alberto! :)

Alberto, was a very good host. He had lots of work to do because he just came back from his trip to Switzerland and still let me stay at his place and took much time to show me some part of Madrid in the evening. We had great conversations about our cultures and he gave valuable advice on tourism in Madrid. Alberto was super generous,  kind and made my stay super enjoyable.
Thank you so much and see u in Berlin

I feel very lucky that i was able to stay with Alberto! He is very kind and free spirited also clean and and active. i appreciate that he took the time to show me around town and teach me about the many things I didn't know about Madrid. thank you Alberto and i hope to be able to return the favor some time.
I stayed with Alberto 3 days, and he was very kind and friendly. He adviced me to visit nice places and he is very active guy! If u think about asking Alberto to host u, dont doubt !

This guy is one of the good ones. Warmhearted,  welcoming and a respectful person. He really cared about making my stay memorable and making me feel comfortable around him and his place. In some moments I feelt more like I was in a hotel, in other ones like I was with a close friend who I know for quite some time, since we could talk for hours about pretty much everything.
Thank you for all your kindness !

I stayed at Alberto place for one night. We met after his job. He showed me Madrid,  we had great time together (nice conversation,  tasting of wine from his home town,  the best view points of Madrid). Alberto was very helpful and careful all the time.  Even he order taxi to airport.

I strongly recommend Alberto as a host and a good company! Flat is clean, couch comfortable and Alberto is always helpful! And yes, mojito! I have never drunk a drink prepared in this way - cool! :) All the best for you Alberto and see you one day in Poland ;)

It was my first Couchsurfing experience and Alberto made it awesome! It makes me excited to keep doing it for sure! I had plans change at the last minute and he was really flexible and nice about it even though I had to wake him up quite early! Instead of two nights I could only stay one and I was pretty bummed by it! Dinner, dessert, and drinks were all awesome and we had solid conversation through it all! I would definitely recommend Alberto to stay with, he can definitely show you some Madrid highlights including the best mojitos in town! :) thanks again! Have so much fun in South Africa and if you ever make it to Alaska I'll tell you all you need to know!
response: {'text': 'Taylor had an unexpected detour to Oviedo, but she managed to arrive. She was cool about me not being with her during the day, but we had a really nice evening! text:
I had a wonderful time at Alberto's. He had offered to host me following my public trip but ended up hosting me spontaneously when my original host canceled on me. So thank you so much for not leaving me homeless!!
Him having a "German" house was very up my alley - don't forget to take off your shoes. ;)
We had great long and interesting talks and he also gave me a short tour of the city including the best Mojito bar ever. On top of that he gave me lot of tips for what I could go and see.

All in all it was great, would 100 % recommend.

Juan received me for the last minute couch request which shows that he is a decent and super kind gentleman. Juan introduced me to his lovely Moroccan friend and together they showed me all Madrid in a very short time. Thank you very much for all the cool rides. I won't forget our moment at TGIF resto - tasty Mexican food :)

Juan is a total sweetheart! He even picked me up from where I was to come stay at his house. He has wifi ladies a gentlemen. He was so kind he took me around town and showed me his favorite places to at. He also helped me out at western union when my family wired me money cuz I lost my card. I also had an allergic reaction to sojme seafood i ate and he took me to pharmamacy to get medicine. He let me use his computer to take care of online business. Very kind and open minded. Super intelligent too. If you get the oportunity to stay with him do so I promise you will not regret it.

My friends and I went to Olivier home in Emirates and we had soooo nice time there.
We went to Emirates for World Professional Championship 2016.
And he came to my home in Shiraz.
Just I can say he is like my Brother.
Best Wishes, Your Brother
fromPublicAddressDescription: Shiraz, Fars Province, Iran (Islamic Republic of)

text:
Oli was great, funny and so kind!!
You can speak with him about several topics. He has a good conversation and try to help you in everything he can.

Really nice guy! Very recommendable!

Vincent was a wonderful, wonderful host! He hosted my friend and me for three nights, giving up his own bed so that we would be more comfortable. He was kind enough to take us on an amazing walking tour of Madrid - he really knows his way around and is super interesting to talk to! We also had fun just hanging out at his apartment, watching youtube videos together, talking, and eating a delicious French tart he made us. Vincent was also kind enough to check in with us after we left, making sure we got to our next destination ok. Thank you so much for everything, Vincent! We really appreciate your generosity and kindness!

I stayed at Vincent's house for 2nights during my short trip to Madrid. He kindly offered me his room and instead he slept on a couch in the living room. Although Madrid was literally burning when I visited(Reached 40 degree), he spared some time for me and showed me beautiful buildings around the city. In addition, we went to some local restaurant and tapas places later on! It was a great fun to hang out with Vincent. He is very knowledgable about the city and Spain since he has lived in Spain over a decade. His house is clean, tidy and full of movie DVDs. One of the best things was his place is the location, which is right in the heart of the city! So convenient to travel around main tourist attractions. Please hit me up when you visit London, so we can hang out again! Merci Bocu!
fromPublicAddressDescription: London, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text: merci merci merci! it was really nice to stay with you, we still remember that taste of the quiche! thanks for not spreading that sleeping gas (just joking, future guests, don't worry), thanks for showing the best perfume in the world, thanks for good directions for the bus station (as you see, we are at home and alive, so we got there successfully). gracias and if you decide to come to Latvia, you will have a home! :)

Vinsent- very pleasant young man, smart, cultured, good interlocutor , educated , fanny,  intelligent, hospitable. He conceded us his bed and we stayed in a separate room. Vincent helped us with advice on the Madrid, to answer for any questions. We talked with them on various topics. He  live close to the center of the town and metro  and the bed was extremely comfortable. Vincent recommended us a lot of nice places to visit in Madrid. He  knows many languages. Sorry for our not very good  English:))

After a few changes of my plan, finally I could meet up and stay with Vincent:) Vincent is like an encyclopedia. He knows Madrid well after spending 15 years here. He literally gave me a tour in Madrid. Vincent is also very thoughful, accommodating and considerate. He knew I was very tired on the day I arrived Madrid by night bus and suggested giving me his bed and he himself sleeping on the couch (thank you so much!!) He can cook well too~ We made crepes and quiche together!!! Now I know how to cook French dishes lolll It was a pleasant and comfortable stay. Thabks again for everything and hope to see you in Hong Kong soon;))

I feel very lucky to have stayed with Vincent. I had just moved to Madrid and he helped me get oriented by showing me around the city and helping me with some of the more tedious tasks like banks and bus passes. He is courteous and thoughtful and welcomed me into his home like family. He is also very knowledgeable about the city of Madrid and can tell you lots about the buildings and streets. Thank you so much Vincent for having me. My transition to Madrid has been much easier and enjoyable thanks to you!

Vincent is a nice and friendly person, he knows a lot of places in Madrid. I was really happy to stay with Vincent because he showed us the principal places in the city with amazing landscapes and after that we had dinner in an amazing place. I ate almejas marineras, I really enjoyed them. The Vincent's house is a really confortable place to stay in, I really recommend it.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Saint-Nazaire, Pays de la Loire, France

text: Thank you for all. It was great time on our trip. Vincent is very friendly and kind man.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Prague, Hlavn√≠ mƒõsto Praha, Czech Republic

text:
Vincent offered to host me after I wrote a message on the public wall of Madrid. I was very thankfull for his offer. Vincent is a wonderful host, he let me stay in his bed whilst he took the couch and he even let me stay another night when my blablacar got cancelled. He likes to walk around the city and hang out a lot :)
He didn't leave the key behind so when he left at 8 a.m. to go to work I had to leave to and I could not use the appartment before he got back at 20h. For me that was not a problem but I think it is a good detail to know. Thank you Vincent for hosting me!
Vincent was our first hoster on this site. Thank you for hospitality, for your perfect English, for bottles of water and we are waiting for in Krak√≥w!:)
Vincent is perfect as a host and as a tour guide. I would definetly recomment you to stay with him

Since I already got a place a stay in Madrid, I didn't stay at Vincent's home, but we met up after he's off from work and it was such a pleasant evening (:
Vincent knows I like watching sunsets so he took me to a place of his personal favourite where we could see the splendid sunset on the left, the castle on the right, and with mountains as the backdrop! All the way since we met he has been introducing the buildings and monuments we passed by, and he's really observant taking note to some architectural features I never noticed. We had a light n nice dina and went up to a lounge for a drink and the beautiful night view. I especially liked talking to Vincent as he's very open-minded, and it's inspiring to know about how he lives in Spain as a foreigner. I hope we can meet again soon Vincent (:
fromPublicAddressDescription: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China

text: Vincent was such a wonderful host. He really dedicated his weekend to showing me the parts of Madrid that I had not seen before. He was very respectful and did such a great job explaining the various places we went to. He is great to have conversations with, and has a warm, fun personality. I would highly recommend traveling around Madrid with him. He knows the best places to go for food or sight-seeing. Thanks for such a lovely weekend, Vincent!
However we were unable to meet Vincent because of the  unfortunate events in our country, he was very friendly and welcoming.

I met Gerard in his new year's eve potluck party at his place. He's super friendly, took care of guests, and easygoing. Later on when I stayed with him, his brother and flatmate Becca, they are all nice as well. His flat is right next to the Plaza Sol, which is really center in Madrid. Thanks for all!

I saw Rafael's open request for host in DF and invited him, and I can only say I'm happy that I did, it was totally awesome. He brought me Spanish wine and Spanish jam (and they really know how to make both things), was a lot of fun to hang out with, and joined us for a birthday party of another CSer. In two short days, apart from having fun, we already decided to earn a lot of money exporting mezcal from Guerrero to Spain (that is, if we don't drink all aforementioned mezcal ourselves, it seems to be a serious risk), and conquer Brazil (it turns out him, myself and my roomie by coincidence are going there about the same time next year). I'm sure we're gonna see each other again!
fromPublicAddressDescription: London, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text:
Rafael is a great host!

He is a well rounded person that shares a passion for traveling and knowing about other cultures. He loves learning new languages and even organizes gatherings among international persons in Oviedo. There's always something to talk about with Rafael and he has many wonderful experiences to share. I had a pleasant time at his city with him and a friend of mine. 

Oviedo is a beautiful city and Rafael was a wonderful tour guide. Even though my friend and I stayed at his place for only 1 1/2 days, Rafael recommended us places to visit so that we could make the most out of our visit to Oviedo and Gij√≥n. 

He's a gentleman and a very respectful person; and his couch was VERY comfy!

Thanks Rafael!

text: I am very grateful to have been natalia's guest. I had the best time I could in madrid. She is a special human, I loved being around her. We spent a lot time together and with her friends both outside and in her beautiful house and I am very grateful for that. Hope to see you soon. Send kisses to your cats natalia!

Natalia is super cool! She was out of the city till my last day in Madrid so she just invited me to have a coffee at her house, immediately I could tell she's a cool and relaxed person, definitely nice experience to stay in her home :)

Natalia are awesome! Really nice. His House are amazing, and she alwais try to make you feel Happy. Aswell she know really well the city and a lot of Cool places to be. Totalli recomended, i Hope to be there again! :)

I hosted Sandra for 4 nights. She is very nice, kind and open minded person. We had a lot of fun together and had nice convervations. I would absolutely host her again. Thanks for your visit. You can come to my home whenever you want :)

Sandra was my first guest:) I firmly convince she is very polite and friendly person  :) We spent together only one day however it was wonderfull morning in the old city and I would love to see her again :)
I had very pleasant and funny discussions with her over (too ;) brown bread and sesam sticks - really enjoyed the little time we spent together!

Was an absolute pleasure to meet Sandra and I've been her 2nd host on CS. I really enjoyed talking with her. She is such a caring, warm, loving and talkative lady. We shared some stories and had a walking tour and dinner in Novi Zagreb. Although she stayed for just one night, she explored the city (following my hints) and spent a quality time. Everyone should try and meet Sandra, you wouldn't want to miss this opportunity. And I'm pretty sure that we'll meet again in Madrid. 

@Sandra: I hope you'll enjoy in the rest of your tour. Don't miss Luka's ice-cream. And I hope you'll not be attacked again by dangerous mosquitoes on the coast ;)

Sandra is super fun to hang out with. We cooked together, ate together, danced together and partied all night long. She is very outgoing, easy to talk to, and an overall wonderful house guest. Oh, and she also makes a mean Spanish omelette. You are always welcome back here. I hope our paths will cross again one day.

Sandra! I said good bye to her last week but right after I arrived in Porto, I realized what she meant about just staying 2 nights in Madrid is not enough haha
So I decided to come back to Madrid and it was the right decision :) I had so nice time with her, Virginia and her friends. And it was so lucky to meet Sandra's lovely parents and sister :D
Hope to see u soon in Korea! ÏïàÎÖï!

Thanks so much for letting me to stay Sandra!

Although she was very busy at working, she made Sandwich to me and had a great conversation. She knows the way of good hospitality I believe.

Also, we shared our experiences and finally my life became much better !
It was first time for me to do CS, yet Im so happy because I finally learned how CS is valuable, interesting and great ! 

I could not achieve without her efforts. So, thanks for everything and I will reccomend my friends (of course everyone!) to stay and share experiences with her !

Looking forward to seeing you again Sandra and if you come to Japan or Norway, feel free to hangout or stay my couch!

I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better first Couchsurfing experience! Sandra is the most warm hearted, kind, caring and beautiful person! She helped me immensely with absolutely anything. She kept in really good contact, met with me, took me out with her friends for traditional tapas y cerveza, she was translating for me when she could see I couldn‚Äôt understand and she was amazing when I would get very nervous trying to talk espa√±ol! Her friends were amazing people too, we even went for a driving lesson and shared many laughs and stories about our homes! She showed me ALL of Madrid, and even helped me plan out the rest of my trip and places I must go and see! Sandra even cooked multiple traditional dishes for the both of us and never once asked me for money or anything! Sandra is fluent in English and learning so many different languages, she works AND studies harder than anyone I know and I hope to see her again before I leave! A new friend for life!! Ka kite ano (goodbye in Maori haha)

Sandra is an amazing girl! She made me feel like home and we had pretty interesting conversations! 
She is a really open minded persone, who has a thoughtful and relaxed mind... you will love to spend a time with her! She also made me discover some atypical places in Madrid such as cereal bar haha!
Thank you so much for your kindness, your welcome, and to have shared your thinkings with me, you're a beautiful person!
See you, have a great life, i wish you to travel a lot!! Un beso :)
Really friendly, warm, and hospitable. Fed me, showed me around for an evening, and was a nice personality to be around. Highly recommend surfing here :-)

I've been hosted by Sandra for one nigh while I was travelling in Madrid and I've enjoyed the time I spent with her: she's a nice person,  smiling and kind, with which I spoke a lot about everything from language and politics to travel (she travelled a lot, also alone, and this was very inspiring); the next day we also took a coffee together before I got in the bus :)  
Will definitely recommend Sandra for any surfer who is open minded and full of interesting stories like her!

Sandra was such a great host! She showed me around Madrid and told me things I never would‚Äôve  known without her help. She showed me amazing locations to go and made me feel so welcome in her home. Such an amazing first experience on Couchsurfing!

Sandra hosted me only for a night in Madrid! She picked me from the metro and she showed‚Äã me around! I had a great day with her so lovely and smart girl!! She made my little time in Madrid a wonderful memory! I totally recommend her!! I wish I see you again! Maybe in Thessaloniki...who knows!! Thanks for everything!

Sandra has so many interesting stories to share and is a very open-hearted person! We spent some really nice evenings together, trying delicious street food, eating the best ice cream of madrid ;) 
and chatting about everything. It was a pleasure staying with you, Sandra! Hope to see you again some time!

I felt very happy to meet Sandra. She gave me a very good first impression with her sweet and friendly smile. I enjoyed the conversation about so many interesting topics during dinner and she really took good care of me, recommended local dishes, helped me with finding my way. And Sandra is an intelligent energetic and beautiful woman with many great experiences around the world. Because of my compacted plan I only stayed quite a short time, I wish I could have spent more time with Sandra and maybe go dance Salsa together! Hahaha!

It was only one day with her as a host, but still: we had a nice evening and she showed me around Madrid üòÅ
I would defenitly stay again at her place ‚ò∫

Sandra, drive safe and save!!! hehe

Although I stayed at her place for 2 nights we didn¬¥t spend much time together, but was enough to understand that Sandra is a leader!!! Haha
She is pretty respectful person and has a healthy kitchen. We shared some talks, meals and a walk around.

Sandra¬¥s place its in a pretty good spot, not to much in the middle of the confusion neither to far from the center.

See ya around, stay safe!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur, Mexico

text: Sandra is a very cool and good person, I spent 3 nights at her home and it was a very interesting time for me. We went together to a bar, it was cool, thank you again for everything, for perfect time in Madrid and cute couch:)

Despite a late request, Sandra found a way to host me. And I am so happy that she did. My stay at the Sandra's place was memorable.
Sandra is both kind and generous and made me feel welcome at her beautiful flat! Sandra helped me a lot and gave me a lot of useful traveling advice. I staid 2 nights during the week and despite her busy days of work, she led me to a great and typical Tapas restaurant where I could discover some delicious croquetas! And the other night we cooked together while sharing interesting discussions about Madrid, our travel experiences and funny events in our lives. I really enjoyed the time spent together.
Sandra is the best host we can expect and I would love to meet her again in the future in Madrid or Paris :-)
Highly recommend staying with her!
I had a super great time with Pablo, he is funny , smart and very easy going!

Pablo is a great guest to have, interesting to talk with and fun. We explored Malaga together on a spontaneous street-art quest, where we bumped into a star wars manifestation as well. If he asks to surf at your place, don‚Äôt hesitate to offer him a couch!

Pablo  Was a clean, respectful and funny guest. Despite I didn‚Äôt have much time to spend with him, we had cool conversations over dinners or just chilling at home. He cooked really delicious plates at home and was willing to help and to be super clean in the house.
Pablo ‚ÄúPizza‚Äù hahaha, I hope you have and amazing stay in Vienna and a warming welcome back in Madrid. Greetings

Pablo is very friendly person ! He also got very well along with the other cs stayin at my home. Enjoyed chilling with us at breakfast and very active visiting the city during the day. I definitely recommend hosting him !!

Pablo is a nice clean flexible and easy-going guest. I am very impressed that he really enjoyed a local north-eastern Thai dish (actually in a bowl) - the mushroom soup with herbs and ant's eggs in the first evening. Not only it is a kind of spicy dish but also might be considered strange meal for some people (especially for foreigners). However, he (we) finished it till the last bite. This is one of the most important thing that not easily to be found among travellers. I am sure he would explore and learn many new cultural things on his trip.

Cheers,
Jay

Pablo arrived on a Wednesday evening, looking cool and relaxed. From the first moment, he seemed to be really interested in Budapest's history, architecture and its people. Not surprisingly, we didn't need much time to talk about issues like international politics and professional topics.

I had to work during the week and felt quite tired by the end of the day, but he was very understanding.

Pablo is a cool, knowledgeable, relaxed guy and I had a great time hangin out with him. I can recommend him to anyone!

Cheers man!

Pablo stayed with me 3 nights. He has so many good impressions that I don't know where to start. He is so thoughtful and considerate. My students very much like him and I definetely wanna meet him and host him again if I have a chance.
We learned a lot about cultures, people, food and various things and shared many tips about traveling.
Don't hesitate if you wanna meet him or host him because he is extremely funny and friendly.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam

text: Pablo is very thoughtful, he picked me up from the airport, prepered the Madrid transportation ticket for me. Showed me around his area which is very cool and very convenient. text: Pablo is a great host. Helping, friendly, easy-going, respectful and just a nice guy. He showed me around the city he stays - Haarlem and we met in Amsterdam as well to have a glance a bit! I felt myself as a local once I had a chance to live in this cozy and warm place of the Netherlands. Sometimes we cooked for each other which was cool to get this feeling as you take care of your close friend )) and just had fun and great conversation about our lives and experience!! So I absolutely recommend Pablo as a host but take care of his car Diego because he gets jealous when you have a long conversation with Pablo, ahahahah üòÅüò¨

It was much fun meeting Pablo, as he is a very generous and easygoing host. Even though I did not stay for long, he managed to pick me up, guide me through the  city and even made a nice dinner followed by a visit to Jopenkerk which was amazing from him. As a big ambassador of couchsurfing, i think he definitely deserves  a vouch. Recommendation to all surfers and hosts!
Had a great time in Haarlem with Pablo, he's a really nice guy and a lot of fun to hang out with. You're always welcome if you need a place to crash in Amsterdam!
Great great person. Knows a lot about the place he lives in and is willing to share. Open minded and a good laugh! Hola chicooooo saludos para Diego!

We stayed with Pablo for one night. It was a big pleasure to stay with him. He is easygoing, friendly and very helpful person.
 Also he has a nice cat. Kiss him ^^
Unfortunately, we were very limited in time, so we had not time to hang out and speak enough. Anyway, his apartment is very nice.
Thank you very much for this experience. Good luck :)

Our stay with Pablo was wonderful. He was really helpful und gave us local advice on things to do and see. And of course great conversation.
Gracias Pablo and Diego.

I've never known to meet a person so special on couch surfing. We had a lot of moments together. We went to the beaches, we have some beers at a bar in our first day. Romam told me about his life and his social project to teach children to exercise and improve your lives. He is a athlete and I tried to do everything that he did but it was impossible. This guy is a machine! Hahahaha. He told me about Europe and problems in general around the world and I sold him about Brazilian problems and politicians and corruption. He is very smart and cool. I learned too much with him. We went to parties and drink a lot too. I would like to host you again my bro. Now I have a new friend and you are welcome at my home. My house is your house my bro. Thanks for everything. My last days were completely amazing with you. Have a good trip and I hope to see you again earlier. We are the best Romam! I see you my bro!
