text: I didn't have the chance to spend more time with Juan but he is a very friendly guy. He helped me with some language problems since he is bilingual. He is also very well traveled and knows a lot about different countries.

Juan is super funny, cool and kind!
We had a good time together (share food, football match, ours life experiences...) 
He cooked for me (that‚Äôs super kind) 
He made me discover new things
I hope see him again soon

Juan hosted me for one night. It was pretty cool hanging out with him and his friends . He and his brother were nice and friendly, their apartment is great. Altogether I had a very good first evening in Madrid.
I've been in Juan's house during 5 days and he's such an open-minded, helpful and friendly guy. Also his house is really accommodating  and situated in the center. I really recommend him!
I spent two days at Juan‚Äôs place. He has showed me the best spots in Madrid and prepared an amazing ginger tea. I felt comfortable spending time with him. Fully recommended!

Juan is the best host ever!! I arrived to Madrid a bit late at night, I met Juan in  the metro station . He is so kind and sweet! Talented as well, ask him to show u all his epic videos.
We went for a walk in his super cool neighborhood. His place is located right in center of madrid and thats amazing! At the morning i left back to the aieport. But ill b back to madrid in about 10 days and with no doubt i wanna hang out with juan again!! Fun and a grate laugh  are guarantee.
Gracias juan! :)

I stayed in Madrid with Juan and his brother Jose for a weekend back in July and they are soooo awesome! They live in the best part of Madrid and whether we were in or out, there was never a dull moment with these interesting guys. I had such a great weekend and they made me feel so welcome, I couldn't have asked for a better first-time-in-Madrid experience! Hope to see you again soon, Juan! Definitely hit me up if you come to the States, you're more than welcome here!

Me and my friend Sarah stayed with Juan for one night and..... we had lots of fun! Firstly he invited us to meet one night before staying with him and then the next day we were hanging out at his place, joining the party of his friends and finally cooking chicken in the middle of night ! Thank you, Juan, for being such an interesting and entertaining host! Besos y abrazos!

A friend and I spent some days at Juans place, which is definitely in one of the most hip areas of madrid. It was always full house and we got to know a lot of people. I'm already looking forward to welcome you in Berlin soon! :)

I spent my first days in Madrid at Juanca's and Jose's place and that was a perfect choice. Trying to find a room, they were a great help and I had a excellent time at their place. It's located in a beautiful very central area in Madrid and the couch is very comfortable (especially when you slept in car the weeks before haha)! Nos vemos :)

Juan was so nice to host me last minute, he picked me up in the middle of the night in Madrid. He is very open minded and easy going. I didn't spend a lot of time with Juan but was so happy to find a nice place to stay and enjoy his hospitality.
Juan u r so nice and open minded person! we didnt spend too much time together but in spite of it im glad to met u and ur brother :) thank u for hosting me :)greetings

After spending a week at his place in Madrid, I already feel like this city is my home! Juan's such a welcoming, easy-going and friendly host who is always keen to recommend the hidden gems of this city; whether it be the best pizza or gelato joint, the coolest bars... He took us out almost every night and his friends are all fun and lovely too! If you stay with him, make sure you get him to show you his music videos - they're amazing!

I'm so so glad that I got hosted by Jose because he's such a sweetheart!! I had such a good time staying in his apartment and hanging out with him. 

He also helped me out when one of my friends lost her job in Madrid and he let her stay too. We both felt really welcome and I'd love to see him again sometime!

Raul was very welcoming and friendly, I felt really comfortable staying at his place. He also offered to join a lot of touristic meetings that he was guiding to get to know the city better. Anyways, great dude, I‚Äôd definitely wish you all to get to know him!

Raul is a fantastic person, a wonderful man and a host. He has great knowledge of Madrid, knows every corner, every place worth recommending, so that I visited the most important places. As a host he was lovely, cheerful and helpful. He prepared for me traditional Spanish omelette, he sereved wine, cheese and chorizo. I fell in love with Madrid, and in huge part I owe it to Raul. Thank you again! üòä

Raul is awsome guy. He saved our ass when the other guy who told us at the last moment that he can't host us. He let us stay at his place for few days, and he was an awsome host during that time. Thx again Raul and if you'd like to visit Poland, you're always welcome :)

Me and my friend Asia stayed in Raul‚Äôs house for three nights. It was amazing experience to meet such a kind, open-mind and friendly person. He told us a lot about Madrit, and about places worth seeing. He made for us delicious Spanish dishes, and we spent time with his amazing friends. It was pleasure to meet You Raul and see You next time.. maybe in Poland!

Horacio is a super host. I have stayed with him before and always very welcoming. We have become good friends. It is always great sharing experiences with him.
100% recommended for hosting or surfing.

text: Horacio is very welcoming and giving. He treated as a friend.  We were able to spend time together sightseeing and sharing meals even with his busy schedule. We seem to cover every topic in conversation. Horacio is a great host and person.

text: Horacio is a welcoming and interesting guy, who has a nice/conveniently located place. He introduced me to some friends of his, shared his advice and experiences, and even gave me food/coffee/beer! I would absolutely recommend staying with him.

This was my most memorable trip in Madrid and largely thanks to Horacio. I stayed with Horacio (at the very center of Madrid) for two nights and enjoyed every minute.  Horacio is very smart and friendly person. He shared with me insights into Spanish culture and Spain and took me to a very authentic bar- Benencia where he treated me to Manzanilla/Herez and tapas.  
Thank you, Horacio. 
Wish you success with your career!
Best host ever, knows the city very well and has many stories to tell. :)
fromPublicAddressDescription: Oxford, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text:
Horacio was very friendly and hospitable host. We enjoyed his company so much- especialy nice and interesting personality :) He spent with us few hours each evening, talking about Spanish tradicions, culture, what to visit in Madrid, etc.
His flat had perfect location - everything most important in Madrid very close- near nice bars , shops, museums..the railway station -10 min., Shuttle bus stop to Airport- 12 min .We are waiting for you in Vilnius  :)
Thank you dear Horacio :) Jurate and Egle

I had a very nice stay with Horacio. He is friendly, hospitable and kind and gave me tips as to where to go, what to visit etc. He also included me and my friends in some of his plans. His home is nice and the location is great and easily accessible. Thank you again Horacio, you made this first experience a positive one and it would be a pleasure to meet again. Estefy

Horacio is awesome host and great person.I am lucky to spend time with him.I stayed 3 days and two nights at his home.He is friendly,thoughtful,helpful,funny,kind,outgoing.His home is close to all main attractions.He informed me about transportation and location of home before arriving.As he said I really felt at home.And he took me out to nice places and told me about Madrid.I had  wonderful time .Also thanks for the nice songs.Hope we meet again dear friend.

Horacio is definitely the best host one can find. I wouldn't elaborate much on his personality as I believe that he is certainly one of the most open minded and interesting person I have ever met. He has this aura of calm and fun that I genuinely appreciate. 

I stayed 4 nights with Horacio in his nice apartment which is very central and  which is now one of my favourite areas in Madrid as I'm currently residing here. We had loads of fun conversations and he introduced me to some nice bars and restaurants in the area. I also got to meet some of his friends who all seem like fun people.

Overall, I'd highly recommend Horacio's place.

I only stayed for one night with Horacio and I wish I could have stayed longer. He is a great host. We went to a nice location for jerez and tapas and it was like going back in time. We've shared our travel experiences and I had a super nice  evening in Madrid!
Totally recommend to stay with him!

I am so glad i met Mr Horacio he is a very Nice person who has been To many places and travelled To many countries and discovered many cities he has a very valuable experience To share with. He has a very nice house in the center of Madrid close To all means of transport. He is also a person who likes to enjoy life and I never felt bored with his company. i would always appreciate To meet him again and enjoy his company.

Horacio is just the greatest guy.  Super open and interested in a wide range of things.  He lives in a neat little neighborhood with lots of little bars and coffee shops, 10 minutes walk from all the museums.   He'll take you to a bar that has been perfectly preserved from the 1920's, where they only serve sherry, water, and tapas.  It's an older person's scene, and we met his friend Malen there a few times to hang out.  She's great, too.  Had a great time with Horacio!
Horacio is a very friendly guy, I felt like at home. He shown me some very interesting pubs where you can have a nice tapa with your beer or drink a good Jerez wine. I had a great time with him.
Horacio is a perfect host that treats us like we are family. Great person that I'm very thankful to have met.

Horacio is a great, open-minded person! He could share so much experience with me! And it was a pleasure to listen about his adventurous life! And also perfect host, who cares a lot about you. I wish you all the best, less stress and work, new travels and happiness :)

Horacio was a perfect host.  He was able to meet me at the train station when I arrived as it was a national holiday.  Once my luggage was secure at his place we went out to explore the city. He introduced my to a sherry bar that is stuck back in time, which was very interesting.  We explored a lot of the downtown area.  He is located about 15 minutes walking to Puerta del Sol. 
After walking for a few hours we returned home and rested a bit. Later that night we went out to eat, Argentine restaurant which was very good. 
He had to go back to work the next day and works long hours.  But we were able to share late dinners at home around 11pm (which is typical for Madrid). I am very independent so this was not a problem for me.
Horacio was always checking to make sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. 
We talked about our travels, life and Argentina. He is a humorous guy also. We did laugh quite a lot.
I absolutely recommend Horacio as a host or a guest.  Thumbs up!

Hosting Ruben was a real pleasure!
He's very polite and a real gentleman!
I was totally full of work to do but he understood me!
i just hope to meet you again and have more time to spend with you!
you're always welcome!!!

text:
The first time I met Bruno he seemed like a really cool and very funny guy, so when he said he was coming back to Thessaloniki for work I offered him to stay at my house. 

I discovered spending more time with him that he has some annoying habits - he walks too slowly, he hates Thessaloniki, he wants you to teach him Greek but complains when you do, and he talks Spanish at you at 2am and assumes you'll understand. 

So will I invite him back next time? Without a doubt! I love his company and how much I laugh when I'm around him. 

See you in 3 weeks!!

text: Staying a few days at Khalids apartment in Madrid was a good decision. He took care of us so we could wash our clothes, cook, use the bathroom and even sleep in his bed instead of on the couch. The days at Khalid were very relaxing. Also he has a very cute litte cat which I really liked.He is very flexible, kind and uncomplicated. that's what I like about you. Thank you for your hospitality. Wish you the best !:)

Khalid is a very nice, friendly, polite and open-minded person. He picked us up at the metro station and was quite flexible. He wanted us to feel like being at home, so he offered us taking a shower, using the kitchen and his ingredients and even washing our clothes with his washing machine. At his home we could get some rest and felt very comfortable chatting and listening to music with him. Thank you for your hosting! We were glad to stay at your home. :) I wish you amazing travel and enjoy life! :D

text:
I've known Valentina for a little while but it's only now that I decided to share my positive experience staying with her. She was kind enough to let me sleep on her spare bed for a few days when I went to visit Fort Lauderdale. All I can say is WOW! She was a great hostess, very attentive. She even organized a little welcome outing for me on the night I arrived, which I thought was incredibly sweet of her. She was always very friendly and her friends included me in their group so smoothly that I felt like we'd been friends for many years! Her apartment was very nice, clean, well located and organized. I could tell she's a tidy person. The only thing that wasn't completely positive is that her roommate was a little douchy - which is not her fault at all - but luckily he was rarely around. And from what I've heard she's already moved out, so the roommate issue is not even an issue anymore

Bottomline is: Valentina is a great person and you will not regret hosting her, staying with her or meeting her in general.

We had a great time and he fit in right away, so it felt like meeting up with an old friend rather than meeting someone for the first time. text: Herbert joined me with my friend and we had a good time. He's interesting person and easy to talk to. Thoughtful, positive and cheerful, travels extensively and knows a lot about the culture of his homeland. Has many ambitious plans for the future, I liked his philosophy and view on life. It was a very short stay but I was happy to meet him and hope during next visit we'll have more time to get to know each other even better!
Herbert was really friendly and interesting! He told me some great stories about his home country as I'm planning a trip there. It was a shame he could only stay one night.
fromPublicAddressDescription: London, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text: Herbert was actually my first Couchsurfing guest. He only stayed one night with us and arrived a bit later than expected because he accidentally took the wrong train, but it was a real pleasure getting to know him! He gave me and my family some handmade Guatemalan dolls and a brochure of the country in Italian, as a gift. We had some interesting conversations and he was very friendly. I would definitely host him again :).

i dont meet people that often with a clear mission in life, that is even bigger than their own fulfillment. herbert is one of the few who is prepared to take risks for the bigger picture, even if the consequences can be quite dangerous for himself. herbert is one of the them.

inspiring story he has to tell, i wish you all the best in search for justice in guatemala!

text:
Miguel and Luca were nice to host, though Miguel's trip was more of a resting and getting healthy from catching a cold :) 
Though we did not spend much time together, due to our working hours, the guys were fun to hang out with and "pick-up mandarines" :D 
I hope they had a nice time in Riga, and will come back in a warmer time.

Miguel is a really trusted person. I still cannot believe, that I just gave him keys and left him alone in an apartment :D but it really feels, that You can trust him. He is a real party Lion, good and fun person! Good luck, friend from Northern Spain!
Miguel is friendly , open minded and easy going. He's ok with everything you want to do, and cooks a very nice tortilla...  I enjoy to host him!

Miguel is a really nice guy to have around! He couchsurfed on our couch in Gent for one night. We had some nice talks and laughs! He is really polite, friendly and fun, I would defininetly recommend hanging out with him ;-)

Miguel is a great guy! He is smiling, cheerful, friendly and extremely honest. It was very easy to meet every day with him, as he had his phone and data plan active all the time. He has just some trouble with directions, but it was ok :)

Miguel and his friend Emmanuel are perfect couchsurfers! They are spontaneous, open-minded and friendly! It's really easy to talk with them and I really enjoyed the time we spent together laughing, playing some drink game while talking about our cultures, hanging out and dancing in the night club! We walked around Rouen together and guys, if you want to come back here you're welcome at my place! :) I hope you appreciated your stay! See ya! Elsa :)
miguel is a really nice guy to host ... he was only one night with us but it was really nice to host him

Miguel is very kind, polite, helpful and interesting person. He guided us a lot about the city and recommend us about which places to visit in the short time. First night he cooked Spanish food which was very delicious and then we met his friend in the city. She was very nice as well. Next night we went to some performance near his house that was very interesting. We Couldn't stay much because we were tired and had long flight to Ecuador next day. So we left bit early. Thanks a lot for hosting. We enjoyed a lot staying with you but unfortunately we didn't had more time for more interaction. Hope to meet you again soon. Good luck and wish you life full of travels. Cheers!
Thank you so much for the days we spent together. It was my first time in Madrid and it was awesome! You're a really kind and smiling person. See you soon!!
we where really pleased to meet you, we hope your road will cross ours again ! √† bient√¥t !

It is great to host this couple, very beautiful and nice. I still remember the night I was working and heard the sound from his guitar. Very night! I was attracted by their trip too. Hope he and her girl friend have a lot of fun and great experience ahead!
